name: The Secret Pyramid
description: A VR shooting game with Roguelite elements on the theme of ancient Egyptian tomb exploration.

name: Section 13
description: Unravel a thrilling sci-fi mystery in this action-packed twin-stick roguelite shooter. Select your load-out, stack up temporary and persistent upgrades, and delve into the depths of a sinister, shifting, subterranean base in the midst of an interdimensional crisis.

name: Galactic Escape
description: In this top-down roguelike shooter game you go through levels of enemies to escape [???]. You do this with the help of weapons and items you find on the way. You can equip up to two weapons. Mix and match the weapons and items you find to make combos that work together.

name: Ex Natura: Nature Corrupted
description: Ex Natura: Nature Corrupted is a challenging, action packed, souls lite experience developed by Blackburne Game Studio. Fight your way from the deepest cultist dungeos to the top of the holy tree and reclaim your throne in this mysterious "pre-human" era themed epic story.

name: Tea for God
description: Tea F\for God is a VR adventure that uses impossible spaces with procedural generation to allow players infinite movement within their own place. Customizable gameplay can be anything between a relaxing long walk, an intense arcade shooter (checkpoint based) and a roguelite shooter-explorer. Set in the distant future, it is a story about a man who has lost his family and embarks on his last journey to seek answers and vengeance.

name: Cramped Room of Death
description: Spear shall be shaken, skull shall be splintered, a blocked way, a bad way, ere the spike rises! Stab now, stab now, stab! Stab for escape and the room's ending! Cramped! Room of! Death!

name: eCheese Zone
description: eCheese Zone! A punishment party game, a digital escape room, an activity to yell at your friends about! Join others as you collectively struggle to follow basic directions and collaboratively uncover the mysteries of eCheese Zone, nice!

name: Flesh Prison
description: Flesh prison. Who is trapped? You? Or your mech. Blast your foes with immense firepower. Rocket launchers, machine guns, and your trusty massive flesh saw. Turn off your lights, close the door, turn up the volume and rip the knob off. Blow them to pieces as this is what you are now, you are no different than the beasts you massacre. Is this earth? Or is this hell?

name: Monster Ronpa
description:
You've met the freaky fabulous kids of famous monsters in Monster High. And you've seen the despair inducing events of Dangaronpa that ended in ultimate hope. Now get ready for the monstrously despairing mashup of the two: Monsteronpa!

Featuring all new and unique art, and a in depth full length story, Monsteronpa is a love letter to both fandoms that aims to be true to the things that made us fall in love with them. We hope that the love and care that was put into every asset shows through, and that those of you playing enjoy!

name: Crappy Dog
description: Beat Your Highscore! Crappy Dog is one of many Games that tried to rip-off Flappy Bird, this time with dogs!

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Compact Police Vehicle DLC
description: Discover the brand-new Compact Police Vehicle (CPV), available from your very first shift and even on foot patrols! This compact police enforcement vehicle is authorized for driving in parks and along narrow streets, allowing you to move throughout Brighton quickly, as you ensure law and order are always respected. Due to its adorable size, it also serves as an excellent photo opportunity for the city's tourism industry!

name: Possessions
description: Welcome to Possessions, a ghoulish game of programs, puzzles, and poltergeists. In Possessions, you play as a restless spirit, wandering from neighborhood to neighborhood and home to home, possessing the residents therein, and messing with their relationships however suits your fancy. Why? Gotta pass time in the afterlife somehow.

name: Mutus Meteora
description: A virtual gallery where players can explore the highlands, its architecture, discover works of art, collectibles, interact with a third-person character, and adjust the time of day.

name: Space Cowboys: Riders of the Storm
description: Embark on a cosmic journey! Choose your role: Pilot, Engineer, First Mate, or Commando. Conquer the stars with intense teamplay, powerful upgrades, and thrilling battles. Take command, repair systems, or unleash chaos. Victory awaits in this immersive space adventure!

name: Pixel Paint 2: Ultimate Edition
description:
Pixel Paint 2 is a sequel to an extremely popular game by the same name. The rules are quite simple. Put your mind at ease, follow the numbers, and fill out every last pixel with the right color.

It's your first step in becoming an amazing pixel artist. Choose a theme you like and sink into the wonderful world of pixels.

name: Gun Trails
description: Gun Trails is an overhead shooter inspired by genre classics. Players must shoot down enemies while dodging dense waves of bullets, but are able to make use of a hyper laser by building up long combos of enemies.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XV
description:
Hercules was peacefully napping aboard a ship when a gentle breeze turned out to be a storm. The hero’s boat tossed to unknown shores and ripped to shreds. While Hercules was unconscious, a tiny folk gathered around him and… decided to tie the demigod up!
The Lilliputians mistook Hercules for an enemy from a mysterious floating island name Laput which shadows their lands from sun and rain. Then the hero promises to solve the mystery of the island in the sky and save his tiny new friends. But will the Lilliputian king believe a huge foreigner enough to untie him? Anyway Hercules’s going to fight for his freedom and justice!
Together with Hercules you will take a trip through little and big lands, build bizarre devices, fly to the clouds, defeat sky pirates, and face various unexpected situations. Join this fascinating dimensionless journey right now!

name: Say No to Rom-Coms!
description: When your attempt to ask out your crush is met with rejection, your classmate Mineko, who recently experienced similar heartbreak, ropes you into joining her visionary anti-romance club. Together, you form a movement to challenge the expectations of teenage romance and ideals, aka the hierarchy of hotness, that Mineko believes students use to determine if someone is worth dating or not. But things take an unexpected turn when she decides to run for student council president—the same position as the crush who rejected you—with the goal of destroying the hierarchy of hotness that plagues your school!

name: Nothing Somewhere
description:
A story about art, what goes into being a human, and not feeling like a part of that. The lines that divide and define what "being" means are no longer existent, but were they ever there to begin with?

A non-binary visual novel talking about what it means to be neither here nor there- in more merits than one.

name: 59 Fucks the Machine
description:
The story contains a transfem protagonist, wiregore, uncaring gods, and some weird sexy stuff. 14k words, estimated read time 1-2 hours. Hope you enjoy.

an irritable woman named Fifty-Nine makes a journey across the sun-scorned canyons of her world and into the caves below... What is she looking for in those depths, and why is she so hard-pressed to find it?

name: Your Wings My Wings
description: A visual novel about a girl who chooses to love and be loved instead of being haunted.

name: Gravity Crash Portable
description: Retro fun meets futuristic thrills in space shooter Gravity Crash Portable. Blast aliens across 30 hostile planets in stellar missions filled to the brim with wormholes, laser beams and amazing explosions. The battle for the stars has begun – download Gravity Crash Portable today and prepare for lift-off.

name: Pack My Stuff: New City
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant life of the big city in PACK MY STUFF: NEW CITY! Here you will become a master of packing packages and experience breathtaking adventures.

name: Portal: Prelude RTX
description:
In partnership with NVIDIA and powered by RTX Remix, Portal: Prelude RTX is a remaster of the 2008 ModDB Mod of the Year Top 3 Winner, Portal: Prelude, with stunning full ray tracing and high-fidelity assets, the groundbreaking AI-accelerated performance of DLSS 3, and the lowest texture load times with RTX IO. Step into the boots of Abby, the newest testing associate in Aperture Science, as you solve nineteen mind-bending chambers putting your Portal skills to the ultimate test. Make use of momentum, perform narrow escapes through deadly particle fields, and learn to work with manipulated gravity while heartless but dedicated observers watch and berate your every move.

When you finally come face to face with the minds behind Aperture Science, witness the scientific hubris marking the downfall of the facility as the activation of GlaDOS sets the scene for the rest of the Portal series to follow.

name: The Crisis Zone
description: The Crisis Zone is a sci-fi exploration game with elements of horror in a dramatic atmosphere. Explore this open world and find information about how you got here and how you can escape from this quarantine zone. Avoid the monsters and security drones patrolling the territory

name: Nihongo School
description: Let's have fun learning Japanese words with matching games!

name: Friends vs. Friends: Baba's Laundromat
description: Stop by Baba's Laundromat, home to stray pigeons, stinky clothes, and most importantly, the first free content expansion for Friends vs Friends

name: Absolutely Perfect Specimen
description: Absolutely Perfect Specimen is a horror-yuri visual novel about the android maid Pan and her master Dr. Amy G Dala. Follow Pan over the course of a year as she struggles with insatiable hunger and bizarre dysphoria, all while discovering her past and grappling with her dark future.

name: May Angels Fall Down
description: Follow under, to a secretive cult of Icarus filled with lost individuals who seek selfish salvation. At its center lies Haejin, an alluring yet tormented leader whose flesh, when consumed, cures mortality.

name: Robodash
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled journey in Robodash, a brutally challenging 3D platformer. Each fall means starting over as you navigate unforgiving obstacles, dodge treacherous traps, and conquer daunting gaps. Get ready for a rage-inducing platforming experience.

name: Rising Sun Mahjong
description: Mahjong on the background of the rising sun! Soft and delicate morning colors, the city and the countryside in a bluish haze, glistening dew drops on the leaves of trees..... All this and fascinating levels-puzzles in the mahjong genre are waiting for you in this game!

name: Generation Zero: Companion Accessories Pack
description: Pack offers three strategic modules: Medic, Scavenger, and Spotter. Also, advanced armor such as Ballistic Plates, Concussive Plates, and Fire Retardant Insulation. Plus, enjoy 11 cosmetic options for your Companion.

name: Twisted Metal 2
description: Twisted Metal 2 is part of a cult series that debuted on the PlayStation in 1995. The game is a car shooting game in which we play as one of the tournament participants, competing to death and life against other opponents. This is a digital re-edition of the classic action game from PlayStation, available only in digital form as part of PSOne Classics.

name: Twisted Metal
description: A digital re-edition of the classic action game from PlayStation, which initiated the so-called "vehicular combat" genre. Originally released on the PlayStation in 1995, the game is only available in digital form as part of PSOne Classics.

name: Strange Investigations: Secrets Can be Deadly - Collector's Edition
description: Join Dane, the intrepid investigator, as she unravels the truth and grapples with what to believe in this haunting story from imagination to reality!

name: Flowfall
description: Unique puzzle/arcade game where you must fit the correct shapes into the correct gates as you fall.

name: Wood Cube Block: Classic Casual Puzzle
description:
A classic puzzle with blocks for training logic in a modern version!
Meet the classic puzzle in a modern version! Show the skills of strategic thinking and logic to score as many points as possible!

name: Sex Simulator: Beach Resort Girls
description: A steamy sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters, all set in a beautiful decor. You play as a woman who has sex with three different women on her vacation at a luxury resort.

name: Lethal Application
description: Fly through the air in the extremely inefficient way of gun recoil. The burst mode activated by pressing two attack buttons at the same time is All health, 3x attack and significantly increase charge speed Instead, full life recovery. If you're going to die, use it and bet on the reversal!

name: Gig Life Tycoon
description: Struggling to make ends meet in the urban jungle is tough, but when you're responsible for providing for your loved ones back home, the stakes are even higher. Welcome to our survival simulation game, where you take on the role of a migrant worker in a bustling metropolis. Day after day, you hustle to survive by taking on different gig jobs, each one bringing you closer to your goal of securing a better life for your family.

name: Bleed: Arcade Arena Shooter
description: Dynamic top down arena shooter will drag you into the universe of eternal battle for the title of Grand Arena Champion!

name: Looper Looper
description: Looper Looper is a simple clicker game. Click on the requested items, transport them, earn ∮ and upgrade your factory!

name: Purrfectly Hidden Cats: Kittenwood
description: Dive into 'Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenwood', an engaging hidden object game brimming with elusive cats, interactive elements, and captivating mini-stories. Venture beyond whiskers in a world rich with surprises and discover the wonders of Kittenwood!

name: Sap: School Days
description: Be the unseen hand, guiding surreal life across a grid of possibility. Plant the seeds of biomes, creatures, and whimsical machines. Watch your strategic decisions etch vibrant stories. How long can your world survive?

name: King's Son
description: The King's son, whose kingdom has been taken from him, wants his kingdom back

name: Tempo Mayhem
description: Shoot, punch, and cast to the enemies beat. Survive chaotic and dynamic tempo driven rounds. Dash to keep within tempo range or dash to avoid incoming damage.

name: Gobbo's Gambit
description: Jump, climb, crawl, push and knock enemies unconscious in this fantasy dungeon extravaganza! Players must meticulously outsmart their foes, or succumb to their brute force power. Can you escape the dungeon?

name: Survival Sisters: 2048＋1
description: The popular 2048 puzzle Survival Sisters: 2048＋1 is now powered up and available as ""+1 (plus one)""! In a devastated world, the Sisters have returned from the depths of despair to cultivate the sustenance of life today......!

name: Hell Let Loose: Devotion to Duty
description: A historical multiplayer FPS Hell Let Loose shares the Objective mode in its Devotion to Duty update. This shorter and faster game mode will feature smaller teams of just 25 players.

name: Lisa: The Joyful - Definitive Edition
description:
Lisa: The Joyful - Definitive Edition is the newly updated conclusion to the quirky side-scrolling RPG Lisa series. Explore Olathe as Buddy in your quest to punish the world that has treated you wrong. Along the way, learn about Olathe, your family, and the monsters and men in power. The world’s out to get you… Get. It. Back!

The Definitive Edition brings fresh blood to the game with updated battle systems, 6 brand new Warlord skills, new border art overlays, music player, painless (easy) mode, and new secrets to explore.

name: Lisa: The Painful - Definitive Edition
description:
LISA: The Painful - Definitive Edition is the newly updated version of the original quirky side-scrolling RPG, set in the post-apocalyptic wasteland of Olathe. Beneath the charming and funny exterior is a world full of disgust and moral destruction. Players will learn what kind of person they are by being FORCED to make choices permanently affecting the gameplay. Make sacrifices to keep your party members alive, whether it's taking a beating for them, losing limbs, or some other inhuman torture. In this world, you will learn being selfish and heartless is the only way to survive...

The Definitive Edition brings new content and nightmares to the game with HD graphics, party member campfire conversations, updated battle systems, new border art overlays, music player, painless (easy) mode, and new secrets to explore.

name: Lisa: Definitive Edition
description: Explore Olathe and its dark and twisted secrets with Lisa: The Definitive Edition, including the original story-driven RPG game Lisa: The Painful and its sequel Lisa: The Joyful

name: Starsiege: Deadzone
description: Starsiege: Deadzone is a multiplayer corridor extraction shooter set in a dark sci-fi universe where humanity is on the brink of extinction. As space mercenaries, known as Raiders, players will team up with two others to explore the derelict stations taken over by sentient AI. As a Raider, your goal is to extract valuable weapons and resources for your faction. Players will select their class and venture into procedurally generated ships making each match unique. Choose from three distinct classes, each with their own unique abilities and work together to overcome the ship's deadly traps and defenses in order to escape. Beware of the other Raiders seeking the same riches.

name: My Child: Lebensborn Remastered
description:
My Child Lebensborn is a story driven nurture game based on true events. Play as the adoptive parent of Karin or Klaus, and experience the struggles they go through along them.
In My Child Lebensborn Remastered, we are providing more opportunities for you to create more memories with your child, even at the face of tragedy.

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Invisible Man
description:
Invisible Man uses fog to dart around the board and strikes without warning!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Invisible Man - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Back Alley Chronicle
description: One summer afternoon, Saeki is invited by his friend Maeda to go to an old book festival. . . By chance, the self-proclaimed genius scientist Nanaban asked him to search for the lost book! A mysterious incident happens there!？It's that kind of story!

name: Lost Chapter
description: In the abyss, she is awakened by the cold. She has nothing to hold on to, as everything is left in the darkness. The girl moves on with a little light, and leaves all the choices to you. Guide her and find her lost self.

name: Tranquil Garden: Adventurer's Edition
description: Tranquil Garden: Adventurers Edition is a personable, easy-to-pick-up RPG with a Character-Driven Narrative that places you in control of Juniper the Hunter, accompanied by Cedar the Archer and Lily the Hero. And this new, definitive version of the game puts your journey in a whole new perspective!

name: Shaper
description: Shaper is an integrated 2D dungeon editor allowing you to create your own adventure. Create a dungeon with enemies, objects, decorations and share it with your friends and the community!

name: Murder is Game Over: Streaming Death
description: Embark on a thrilling pixel art adventure with Detective Guy & Cleo as they solve a mysterious murder. Explore an eerie seaside village, search for clues, interview suspects, and unravel the truth in this whodunit mystery.

name: Super Bawk Bawk Chicken
description: Super Bawk Bawk Chicken is an infinite runner where you play as a charming chicken with super powers.

name: Righteous Mojo
description: Righteous Mojo follows the Rockstar Selene as she loses a Rock Battle with a demon that steals her talent. With the help of the Rock Fairy himself, she travels through the demon's home world to get her talent back.

name: Remedium: Sentinels
description: Remedium: Sentinels is an auto-shooter with rogue-lite elements set in a grim post-apocalyptic world, where The Grey Plague turned most humans into vicious mutant freaks. Play as a a steel Sentinel and defend the cities against the endless hordes of mutants until your reactor dies!

name: SnowRunner: Season 10 - Fix & Connect
description: Season 10 is included in the Year 3 Pass for SnowRunner. A storm has shaken western Canada, wreaking havoc all over and cutting off power. Reconnect British Columbia's grid and its crucial infrastructures with 2 new trucks across 2 new summer maps.

name: CodeWordPlay
description: Word game for Playdate with 400+ levels and unlockable items & achievements!

name: PuPu's Adventure Park
description: Build an Adventure Park from the ground up! The PuPu clan had just rented a new "playground" from the Dark Goblins. Manage the park, construct park facilities, and grow your clan to serve the expansion of the Park for "hero" customers summoned from other planets!

name: Gleeb Glob
description: GleebGlob is a physics based 2D precision platformer where you play as an emotionally drained employee of a very large corporation, who's only trying to slack off by immersing himself within a video game to delay the inevitable pile of work he must address.

name: From Madness with Love
description: This is a dating sim with guys you will never be on the same page with! For some reason, you just can't communicate with the guy you like... An unusual yet extraordinary experience with a cute pixel art style, fully voiced in Japanese.

name: Full Void
description:
Set in a dystopian future, Full Void is a 2D Cinematic Puzzle Platformer telling the story of a young teenager alone in a hostile world controlled by a rogue AI. Fight your way through puzzles and obstacles to uncover the story that surrounds this broken, run down society, where only children are still free. But for how long?

A pure hand-drawn pixel art adventure that will keep you on your toes from the very beginning, with a few jump scares and a thrilling atmosphere but still suitable for all ages as it does not feature any gore or violence.

Full Void is a spiritual successor to classic cinematic puzzle platformers such as Prince of Persia, Another World (Out of This World) and Flashback, with a modern twist, innovative visual and gameplay mechanics. Along with traditional puzzles, you can use your hacking skills to interact with elements of the game and make your way through this hostile world full of creatures continuously on the verge to get you. In a 2D world, aspects of 3D have been integrated both in the gameplay and visuals.

name: Bloodhound
description: Crush the cult of Astaroth and squash the hell bugs. Bring Astaroth back to where she came from. Enjoy a Fresh Look & Old Fun in this arcade horror FPS game inspired by the legend of the 90s.

name: Roto Force
description: Shoot and dash your way through frantic missions to protect the Rotoverse. Roto Force is a twin-stick shooter set in a rotating world. Unlock weapons, move quickly and fight tons of bosses.

name: My Friendly Neighborhood
description: Something is amiss with everyone's favorite Saturday morning puppet show! For years, the colorful cast of The Friendly Neighborhood delighted audiences across the globe with their cooky capers and educational adventures. However, as time went on and interest waned, the production studio found themselves out of money and closed their doors for good. Toy sales would dwindle, and birthday balloons and cakes would find new mascots. In time, the once household names would fade into increasingly niche fandoms. Until one night years later, the studio unexpectedly clicks back to life and starts broadcasting The Friendly Neighborhood. TV sets across the globe flicker for a moment before the familiar puppets return for a surprise encore! But this isn't your typical family-friendly holiday special... are those puppets eating each other!?

name: Bad Dreams
description: Use real gestures with your VR controllers, do all this quietly because evil lurks, a strange evil that cannot be silenced without taking your head in both hands ... Bad dream is not a game for everyone, be strong in facing your darkest dreams, but never, ever... Fall into Madness !

name: Ember Knights
description: Ember Knights is a fast-paced multiplayer rogue-lite. Build powerful and unique attack synergies on every run by customizing your loadout through weapon upgrade perks, stackable combat and magic skills and game-changing relics. Local and online co-op for 1-4 players!

name: Viewfinder
description: Viewfinder is a puzzle game where you can reshape the world around you by taking photos with an instant camera.

name: Outliver: Tribulation
description: Outliver: Tribulation is an atmospheric, story-driven survival horror action game where you play as Bolanle Gboyega a soldier who mysteriously finds herself in the Realm of Tribulations, a supernatural realm of African mythology where she soon discovers she has to undergo an ancient ritual in order to regain passage back to her realm… or so she thinks.

name: Xenonauts 2
description: A follow-up to Xenonauts that takes place in an alternative timeline.

name: Yellow Rose
description: Pandora spends a week socializing. Make a new friend in a cute, cozy game and nothing bad happens.

name: Idle Pirate Legend
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Free Riders: No Kinect Patch
description: No Kinect Patch is a mod for Sonic Free Riders that completely changes the way the game is controlled and played and quickly became the definitive way for people to experience Sonic Free Riders. This patch allows the game to be played with controller, eliminating the need for a kinect.

name: Hopeless Junction
description: A bunch of tgirls get a trip on the world famous transcontinental express

name: Molecano
description: Molecano is an all-new word puzzle game from the creator of Dadish! Help Molene the mole explore volcanoes using words as a bridge. String words together so Molene can cross safely and collect all the delicious food strewn across the lava loaded levels.

name: Kitten Milk Replacer
description:
Those brave women of legends, Long defeated, but still clinging to her sacred vows:
Whereas others scoff at her with "it's not MY responsibility", she dares to rebuke them:

"Well, what does that matter?"
Needless to say, they bear a terrible curse.
...Can that girl really free us from our suffering?

name: Un Presagio de Huesos
description:
First part of Un Presagio de Huesos, where the promises of the old witch of the swamp are told and the Hero is presented with the ultimate temptation.

Play, O muse, the story of the futile hero; the story about the struggle against heaven and earth that cost the lives of countless orphans, brought a brother from the abysses of the confines to the borders of the Dream and made the rivers of the continent red.

name: Toing's Pops
description: Toing's Pops is a singleplayer survival horror game, you must run and hide from Toing while uncovering the information needed for your escape. Amidst all the chaos, just remember why you came...

name: Planetary Attraction
description: A blossoming love between two wayward planets. Can it endure the constraints of the universe? A cute and short linear click-thru visual novel.

name: Aeryth
description:
Aeryth is an visual novel adventure game about finding her heart.

Aeryth takes place in a deserted world thought to be lifeless. In this world Aeryth a girl known for her useless dreams lives in temple with a priest Po who always seems to be deep in their studies. Today like any other she has a dream one that will lead her to a strange girl, and her own heart.

name: RehAIbilitation
description: A visual novel about a lolita who travels to an isolated place in hopes of fixing herself, leaving behind something dear to her. She meets a peculiar nurse.

name: The Strange Case of Mei Lysel Andi
description: My old friend asked me to meet at her place, but it seems she's gonna be late and has invited me to read this unlabeled book that's just left on the table

name: The Spiral Egg Challenge
description:
The Spiral Egg Challenge! A so special egg has appeared, and The ArcadeTV channel got their grubby lil hands on it...

Join the clumsy and hot-headed Tobble, as they try to cook their way out of a messy situation!!

name: Up the Hill Down to the Nevermind
description: Up the Hill Down to the Nevermind is a game about identity, girlhood, delusion, and memory. A lonely and depressed hikikomori grapples with their existence and transgender identity in a world where delusion begins to intertwine with reality. What once was good is now lost and all there is left is memory. But how reliable is your memory?

name: Rhythm Hell
description: Help a poor seal out by clapping back the rhythms shown! Clapping on cue makes the meter go up, missing cues makes the meter go down! Aim for the highest score as the difficulty slowly progresses!

name: Otherworld Legends: Alasdair
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Cepheus Protocol: Free Vehicle Camo Post Modern Collection
description: We are thrilled to unveil the Post-Modern Camouflage Pack: a set of three unique patterns - Desert Sand, Forest Green, and Snow. What's even better? This downloadable content (DLC) is completely free for all players who wish to acquire it.

name: Succubus Runa and the Erotic Dungeon: Additional All-Ages Story & Graphics
description: "Additional All-Ages Story & Graphics DLC" is you can play the game that graphics and story without adult contents for all-ages.

name: Cepheus Protocol: Support Pack Vehicle Camo Classic Wars Collection
description: Experience the intensity of some of the bloodiest American wars from the twentieth century with Vehicle Camo Pack #2. Immerse yourself in the history of the Second World War, Vietnam, and the Gulf War through camo designs that faithfully represent each conflict.

name: Please, Forgive Me
description: "Please, Forgive Me" - is a psychological horror game that tells the creepy story of an overconfident realtor named Pavel. He needs to check the old apartment and rent it to a certain woman. This night will turn into a real nightmare for him.

name: Unreal Strike
description: Unleash creativity in Unreal Strike's moddable FPS. Engage in intense battles, master gunplay, and explore dynamic maps. Ready to make your mark?

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Wielton Trailer Pack
description: The Wielton Trailer Pack DLC includes officially licensed content including 6 trailer types, with a variety of trailer and chassis sizes, cabin accessories, and customization options.

name: EOS-503
description: Welcome aboard EOS-503! As a professional DATA Agent, it's up to YOU to help the community resolve interpersonal disputes, navigate delicate political situations, and persuade fellow space travelers of new and different solutions to their problems. The future of humanity depends on it!

name: God'n Spy Add-on: Power & Revolution 2023 Edition
description: With the God'n'Spy add-on, you can be the master of Power & Revolution and intervene in world events by accessing all the key factors of the game, manipulating them as you see fit and creating or modifying events at any moment !

name: Blade Fury
description: The player is equiped with advanced movement mechanics in order to clear levels by avoiding obstacles, killing enemies and eventually obtaining a key which will be used to access the next level.

name: Power & Revolution: 2023 Edition
description: The latest edition of the ultrarealistic world simulator where you play as the Head of State or as the opposition! New Additions: dive deeper into the war in the Ukraine with artillery, trenches, mines, troop morale, etc; detailed immigration management; the justice system; and children.

name: L'Angolo Di Farenz: Avventure Vampiresche
description: "In "Avventure Vampiresche" Farenz faces morning obstacles in an epic race through Cremona at 5 o'clock in the morning! Dodge ducks, spitballs, runners, and more to close the rings in time! Get ready for a frantic and enjoyable experience!"

name: Ambush Tactics Advanced
description: A simple modern medieval tactics RPG.

name: Moto Racer Simulator GT Games
description: Get ready to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the world of Motorbikes racing in our groundbreaking new game - Moto Racer Simulator GT Games.Take control of your destiny as you delve into the realm of motorcycle customization. You can customize every detail of your moto to match your personal style and maximize its performance on the track.

name: Cats Hidden in Paris: Extra Level
description: Play a brand new level enriched with intricate details, vividly illustrating the mesmerizing city of love! 100 Cats have once again decided to hide themselves but this time it will prove to be a much greater challenge to find them all!

name: I Have a Dream
description: I HAVE A DREAM is a 3D puzzle line game. You wake up in a place you've never seen before. Adapt to the transformation of various points of view and get out of here!

name: Donut Land Clicker
description: A casual game where you need to conquer the world with your donuts, so that everyone talks about your donuts in every nook and cranny. To build an empire, you have to curse a donut, and then on the accumulated donuts - build an empire, buy business after business, improvement after improvement.

name: Under the Water Depths
description: Under the Water Depths is a first-person game in which you will dive into a trench in the middle of an unknown ocean. The depths of the sea hide sinister yet mystical secrets.

name: Death Slayer
description: Death Slayer is a 2D Metroidvania-style platformer where you control Asura, a young swordswoman whose goal is to eradicate the evil that plagues her land.

name: Forklift Racer
description: Forklift Racer is a brand new arcade forklift experience. With realistic handling, and online multiplayer, Forklift Racer offers an experience like no other. Customize your Forklift, play with friends, and race to the finish line!

name: Clash of Stars
description: MMO Real-time strategy star game.

name: Nightmare Zapping
description: A horror channel browsing game where each channel holds a different nightmare to experience, explore them and find out the truth about what has happened in a small town where the inhabitants have disappeared.

name: Queen of the Otaku: There can be Only One
description: A short visual novel about a manga club torn between its two competing princesses.

name: Boxed Tower: Actual Tower Defense
description: Defend your tower against waves of enemies. Survive the horde.

name: Harry Potter Tamagotchi
description: Harry Potter Tamagotchi is an upcoming crossover Tamagotchi Nano model based on the Harry Potter series.

name: Meaningless
description: Solve puzzles by moving blocks to guide the ball to the exit in a minimalist 3D world. Take the time to appreciate your success; it's hypnotizing and satisfying to watch.

name: Dreamkeeper
description: You play as Marshmallow, the cute little pet of a girl named Ava who wants to become a heroine and save her village from the Nightmares. To protect her you use magical bullets, tarot-cards and try to find your very own playstyle to unlock the story and get the highest score!

name: Clueless Crosswords
description: Are you smart enough to be completely clueless...?

name: Piscirazzi
description: Dive into Piscirazzi, an underwater photography roguelite! Take photos of exotic fish and choose upgrades to enhance your camera. Then review your stunning photos to improve your photography skills. Can you snap them all?

name: Executioner Girls
description: Executioner Girls is a difficult turn-based RPG. Skilled adventurers and criminals hid in secret graveyard. You have to be "Chara", the executioner girl, and explore this place and complete the only mission given.

name: Sticky Business
description: Experience the joy of running your own cozy small business: Create stickers, pack orders and hear your customers’ stories. Time to build the cutest shop on the internet!

name: Cats Hidden in Paris
description: Find 100 cats hiding in Paris, France in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Feudal Friends
description: Feudal Friends is a competitive tower defense game. Each player has different tasks within the tower and they work together to produce new soldiers and determine strategies to conquer the opposing tower. Plan your strategy well because this war does not wait for anyone!

name: IsoChess
description: Play chess online, vs AI, or vs a local player in our clean 2D and 2.5D chess game.

name: Balance 100
description: This game requires controlling your hands to cure that slight OCD, Maybe occasionally drive you crazy, But don't worry. You'll probably be able to do it.

name: The Immolate
description: You will be subjected to the savagery of the spirit possessed by the devil. Try to get out of the old house you were trapped in! Retro survival horror game in the 90s

name: Shape Shipter
description: In this arcade shmup roguelike, you control a shapeshifting spaceship. Adapt to a different playstyle in each encounter - shoot, dodge & destroy wave after wave of the toughest foes.

name: Love & Sex: Second Base
description:
Love & Sex: Second Base is a dating sim where a geeky guy or girl gets to be be roommates with two very hot people and meet plenty of others in their daily life. The player has the choice of taking on the role of either a guy or a girl and meet a whole cast of unique and memorable characters along the way.

Mike is a young code monkey in a big company, even surrounded with beautiful girls his love life is in disarray. His high school sweetheart cheated on him and his latest flame is dating on of his friends. Will you be able to help him find love and avoid the pitfalls of dating life or will he end up alone and unhappy?

Bree is a college freshman, penniless and a bit socially awkward. Help her find a job and succeed in her studies to become a successful woman or lead her down a dark path of drugs and debauchery.

Basically, their lives (and love lives) are yours to control!

name: Temporian
description: If you were sent back 10,000 years into the past, could you not only survive, but give ancient Earth a technological leap forward? Based on real techniques and technology, (re)invent everything from an apple pie to electricity.

name: The Complex: Expedition
description: You play as one of MagWave's researchers, going on an expedition into the Complex. When that expedition goes horribly wrong, you're left alone and lost, wandering the infinite maze of hallways. Otherwise known as the Backrooms. Might there be something in there with you?

name: Zodiac Hentai: Hellish Memory
description: In this game you have to memorize the cards while surviving a real hell of bullets, with illustrations of beautiful sexy girls. Challenge your skill, your reflexes, your memory and dodge the shots to leave the girls as they came into the world.

name: The Break-In
description: The Break-In is a 4 player online co-op burglary game about sneaking into houses, museums, and bank vaults to steal everything that isn't bolted down. Use your profits to buy special thief equipment to help you tackle more dangerous locations.

name: Stonks-9800: Stock Market Simulator
description: A simulator of a businessman on the Japanese stock market in the 80s and 90s. Chill, catch a retro vibe, and watch your profits grow in the text-based game STONKS-9800.

name: Pokémon Sleep
description: A sleep-tracking game that allows you to attract Pokémon that match your sleeping style.

name: Siblings
description: Sin descripción

name: Toilet Fight: Open World
description: You begin your journey as a simple cameraman, determined to survive and expose the terrible threat that Skibidi Toilets pose.

name: Dysphoria
description: This is an attempt to make a serious, somber hack, something attempting to be artistic or poetic.

name: Octate
description: The first Doom map from Mr. Hypnos, inspired by and dedicated to the memory of John W. Anderson (aka "Dr. Sleep") and the legacy he left behind.

name: Bleak Winter
description: The world is against you in this brutal third-person survival experience, and your only goal is survival at any cost. Loot, build, scavenge and craft your way to survive against the world and everything within.

name: WordHopper
description: An arcade-style word game in which the player spells words starting at the center of a letter grid.

name: Shards of God
description: Shards of God is a retro hand-painted point and click murder mystery. It was originally started as part of AdvJam2023, and the full game was then finished within two months.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack - Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Colorful
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Daycare Descent
description: Daycare Descent is a co-op shooter inspired by Left 4 Dead. Take control of our four trepid adventurers as they battle toys throughout the daycare in search of snacks. Tighten your diapers, grab your pacifiers, and fill up your water guns. Playtime's just begun!

name: Ecstasy / Light / Inertia
description: "Ecstasy / Light / Inertia" is a short immersive journey that redefines music engagement. Play as Luz, navigate through stunning landscapes, and unravel an intricately woven narrative. With original music, philosophic themes, and state-of-art HRTF audio, it's a free, story-centered music adventure.

name: Gynogenesis: The Next Day
description: Gynogenesis explores a remote government base in the arctic through the shoes of an aging animal TV show star. Explore the heart of darkness lurking beneath the ice.

name: Project Teddy
description: Welcome to Project Teddy, the ultimate multiplayer game that promises endless fun and thrilling shootouts with your friends. Get ready to explore a game that was partially inspired by the popular games Garry’s Mod and Half-Life.

name: Epochrypha
description: Epochrypha calls you and your friends to hack and slash through time as you work together to unscramble it. Choose from a band of unique warriors as you play hot-potato with unstable relics, fight through fast paced combat, and restore order to the timeline.

name: YARG
description: YARG (a.k.a. Yet Another Rhythm Game) is a free, open-source, plastic guitar game that is still in development. It supports guitar (five fret), drums (plastic or e-kit), vocals, pro-guitar, and more!

name: CaveFiction
description: "Cave Fiction" is a self-developed "game" that is actually a monstrous creation born from the author's sad, arrogant, and foolish consciousness. Its name is derived from a classic metaphor in Plato's philosophy, making it a manic modern story within a classical narrative framework.

name: W.T.
description: "Perfect" is possible only for those who know mathematics. When you open your eyes, you are alone in a white room. In a mansion dominated by the mysteries of numbers. Solve the presented math puzzles and aim for the exit.

name: Top Classic Plaigarized
description: Welcome to Top Classic Plaigarized (the misspelling is intentional). This game was heavily influenced by "Top Neon Rush". Avoid obstacles and shrink when you need to (some obstacles can only be avoided by shrinking).

name: Super Kids Racing: City Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternal Realm
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Maura Bros. 3
description: This new romhack offers 8 new worlds and levels. Increase the difficulty as the game progresses.

name: Theorists
description:
Welcome to my game, buddy!

Matt is glad to see you! He waited a long time for someone to visit him! Feel like at home and get ready for endless theories!

This game is a parody of the Mr. TomatoS game based on the intro of an Game Theory video. It's not meant to make fun of the original, it's just a silly fan game.

name: Tamagotchi Uni
description: The Tamagotchi Uni is a virtual pet released by Bandai Toys on July 15, 2023. It is designed as a successor to the Tamagotchi Smart and the Tamagotchi Pix, and it is the first color-screen Tamagotchi device to have a simultaneous global release.

name: Backrooms Cycle
description: Backrooms Cycle is an immersive exploration FPS horror set in the backrooms. You will explore and scavenge, build up your arsenal and gain powerful perks. Every time you begin a new cycle, you will meet new threats and opportunities in a procedurally generated world.

name: Zombiolence
description: A rotten world, in which despair and extreme survival come together in order to end the largest plague of Zombies ever seen. Face them all, in order to save humanity from its end. Buy, improve and plan a strategy to kill each and every one of them. Do you have what it takes to get it?

name: Johnny Trigger: Definitive Edition
description:
Johnny Trigger – International Man of Mayhem!
Dive straight in and get shooting! Johnny Trigger’s short but immensely satisfying levels make it the perfect action game to fill a short break. And if you’ve got a little more time, there’s so much to collect and a new challenge round every corner.

This action-packed experience includes content from the base game and 6 DLCs that add the skins: Lunatic, Butcher, Avenger, Hunter, Johnnybee and Hotshot along with their unique weapons: Showtime, Vengeance, Hurricane, Triforce, Bulletstorm and Sawed-off.
It also includes various in-game currencies totaling 4500 gems used to buy other currencies, 175 puzzles to unlock more comic graphics, 65 keys to open locked doors in base, 150 hammers to unlock other upgrades in base, 35000 money to buy or draw weapons and skins in shops.

name: Heart of Mobius
description: Dive into a captivating standalone story in just an hour! Presenting the first installment of the "Handy Novel" series. Highly praised on smartphones, this acclaimed narrative is now ready for your enjoyment on Steam for PC/Mac!

name: Idle Industries
description: Idle Industries: Build, Prestige, Prosper! Unleash miners, refine resources, and construct your empire in this addictive factory-building sim. Reach new heights of wealth and prestige with doubled rewards. Original music, 20+ hours gameplay, and customization!

name: Endless Suburbia
description: A hyper-realistic horror driving game set in a suburban environment. Drive through six different atmospheric experiences where an alien invasion, spider infestation, murderous mime, and other frightful events will happen.

name: Slimegeon
description: Slimegeon is a 3D first person roguelike dungeon-crawler game where the player runs through dungeons and possesses defeated enemies to use their abilities and takedown bosses to continue to the next floor. Through the dungeon, the player can level up the unique skill trees for each enemy.

name: Orgasm Simulator 2023
description: In Orgasm Simulator 2023, you'll step into the shoes of a man who embarks on a new chapter of his life, moving into a new apartment and finding a job, only to discover that the real transformations await him in the heart of his home.

name: Succubus Prison
description: You've been dragged into robbing a house by a couple of thugs, but what you discover there is beyond anything you could have imagined.

name: Freak Hunter A Retro Type
description: Freak Hunter A Retro Type is a very fun platform game. Kill all creatures and complete the level. The more creatures you kill, the more points you get. But check the ammo of your gun because when it runs out you will have to use a knife.

name: Calamity Creatures
description: Calamity Creatures is a 2D action game in boss rush format. Mechanical creatures of overwhelming stature stand before you. Gadgets in the prosthetic hands, the terrain, and the enemies' habits...use all the elements to dismantle the living calamity.

name: Geometry Arena 2
description: Geometry Arena 2 is a free-form arena-shooter Roguelite game, dedicated to creating an exciting battle experience. Freely combine difficulty options, components, modules and upgrades to create the best gaming experience for yourself!

name: Dice of Olympus
description: Dice of Olympus is a strategy game that uses customizable dice as game logic to defeat online players or monsters in a rich adventure mode, or against your friend or people around the world thourght the multiplayer mode.

name: QuizMi
description:
A brand new quiz trivia mobile game that builds on the legacy of QuizUp and brings a fresh take on the genre.

Play against others worldwide with exciting multiplayer features, challenge your knowledge with a variety of categories and questions, and experience the excitement of a brand new quiz trivia game.

name: Super Mario Sunshine Seaside
description: Sin descripción

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Complete Edition
description: This bundle includes two new characters - an adorable dragon and a super-sweet red panda.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Premium Edition
description: This bundle includes eleven colors for your fly rod and your fishing net.

name: Pumping Station
description: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. Mouselook is recommended, but not required. Dynamic light must be enabled.

name: Voidspawn
description: A somewhat small and uncomplicated map for Boom (-cl9).

name: Super Luigi Wii: The Emissary
description:
SLWii: The Emissary is a a complete revamp of Ultimate Super Luigi Wii that was released in a rush and unpolished state back in 2020.

Based around Newer SMBWii, The Emissary stars Luigi in an adventure heavily inspired from Super Smash Bros Melee and Brawl with custom music, models and inspirations coming from those respective games.

name: Feast Manor
description: After being cursed to never leave, Ember must eat all of the food she can in order to find the one that will break the curse!

name: Dumb Ways to Climb
description: Get ready for a game that'll make you question all your life choices! Introducing "Dumb Ways to Climb" - the incredibly unimpressive creation that miraculously appeared in just one week! Watch in awe as our brilliant Bean aimlessly climbs on random stuff, reaching for the stars... well, kind of.

name: Small Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe
description: This Hack includes a grand total of 15 levels, where 8 of them are completely new.

name: Days End: Becoming Blackbird
description: Becoming Blackbird is a story about how the player joined the blackbirds when has no where else to go to.

name: Exoprimal: Deluxe Edition
description: Exoprimal is an online, team-based action game that pits humanity's cutting-edge exosuit technology against history's most ferocious beasts - dinosaurs.​​

name: Emergency Crew 3: Perfect Getaway - Collector's Edition
description: Our heroes are finally taking their well-deserved vacation to a chic tropical paradise! But alas, a major earthquake interrupts their vacation before it even starts and turns a secluded tourism destination into an isolated disaster area.

name: SeaFeud
description: SeaFeud is an underwater arcade racing game where players ride on a variety of fast fish. Swap fish mid-race to dynamically change your abilities, items, and stats. With eight different characters and three different courses to select from, players can have endless fun racing the seas.

name: Save Room: The Merchant
description: Immerse yourself in the Save Room, a place of safety and respite. Master inventory management while interacting with the enigmatic merchant. Buy, sell, and acquire crucial items to conquer every challenge. Not only will you need cash, but you'll need GUTS to finish this game!

name: Restaurant Battle
description: Challenge yourself as a novice restaurateur in the face of existing competition. Open your establishment, decorate it according to your taste, manage staff and control purchases. Do everything to become the best, using honest and not very ways!

name: Hentai Girls: Ultimate Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world inhabited by Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: Beast Dungeon
description:
A classic roguelike dungeon-crawler game with pixel graphics.

Fight your way through ten levels of a dungeon filled to the brim with aggressive monsters in order to take down the big, bad boss. The Lich Lord awaits you with powerful magic. Will you triumph, or will you become just another pile of ashes on the dungeon floor?

Gather equipment, spells, and skills to build your strength and defeat the ultimate challenge!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
description:
Jump into your food truck and business will bump up!
Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck!

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Electation
description: In the game you need to pass the levels killing various creatures, some will run away from you, others on the contrary, will chase and attack you.

name: Sector One
description: Sector One takes you on a journey through 6 different worlds, where your goal is to fly your spaceship as long as you can, neutralizing enemies on the way. Each world offers a unique visual experience but also comes with different kinds of challenges that you need to overcome.

name: Medved Hellraiser 2
description: Continuation of the carbon monoxide trash shooter. The player has to go through all the levels, burning enemies with a fire ax, and shooting them with a shotgun and grenade launcher musket.

name: Nodes Escape
description: The game presents realistic game graphics through sound effects, narration and imagination. The level design is subtle and challenging, allowing players to challenge their intelligence and logic skills in solving puzzles.

name: Zombie Arena Survival
description: Survive in an arena where more and more zombies appear and try to kill you. Kill as many zombies as possible before they kill you.

name: Snow White: Interactive Book
description: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Interactive classic stories for all ages.

name: Ridiculous Fishing EX
description:
An updated, handcrafted game about fishing with guns, chainsaws & toasters.
Follow Billy as he tries to find redemption from his uncertain past. Chase your destiny on the high seas and embark on a heroic quest for gills and glory.
An all-new 3D Ridiculous Fishing built from the ground up by the original award-winning team, with new features:

name: Exoprimal: Witchdoctor UFO Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Support-type exosuit Witchdoctor -- known for delivering shocking blows to enemies and repairing squadmates. Equip these cosmetic items and leap around the battlefield as a UFO. You'll be sure to stand out!

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Splash! Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Assault-type exosuit Barrage -- known for lighting the battlefield ablaze with grenades. Make a splash in the heat of battle with this cool cosmetic set as you engulf your enemies in flames!

name: Exoprimal: Roadblock Tragic Monster Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Tank-type exosuit Roadblock -- known for protecting allies with its massive shield. Transform into a horrifying monster and unleash your wrath on enemies and opponents alike! Equip these cosmetic items and command everyone's attention!

name: Exoprimal: Zephyr Security Guard Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Assault-type exosuit Zephyr -- known to leverage its mobility and stylishly slay enemies. This guard instantly detects all types of danger! Equip these cosmetic items and keep your teammates safe!

name: Exoprimal: Deadeye QB-W Set
description: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Assault-type exosuit Deadeye -- known for its ability to skillfully slay dinosaurs from a distance with its rifle. Daily training is imperative for survival! Equip these cosmetic items and lead your team to victory!

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 4
description: An erotic Visual Novel featuring HD graphics, set in beautiful decor. The Sex Story continues with Ruby's perspective, as she decides to antagonize Hunter and test the limits of his possessiveness by fooling around with the pool boy right in front of him.

name: Abandonware
description: A lo-fi collection of horror mini games that begins to warp and shift as you uncover more. Play and watch the lines blur between fiction and reality in this one-of-a-kind experience.

name: Eroblast: Playful Pack
description: In Playful Pack you get up to 10+ hours of new gameplay, more flirting and pics thanks to 80 new levels and 8 new girls.

name: Eroblast: Spicy Pack
description: In Spicy Pack you get up to 10+ hours of new gameplay, more flirting and pics thanks to 80 new levels and 8 new girls:

name: Eroblast: 24 Hot Waifus
description:
24 Hot Waifus includes:
- Playful Pack
- Spicy Pack
- Passion Pack

name: Eroblast: Waifu Dating Sim
description: You'll be able to chat with attractive girls, know their engaging storylines, receive spicy pictures, and solve Match-3 Puzzles to unlock new and cool pick-up lines for your waifu!

name: Eroblast: Passion Pack
description: In Passion Pack you get up to 10+ hours of new gameplay, more flirting and pics thanks to 80 new levels and 8 new girls.

name: Eroblast: Waifu Dating Sim - 37 Waifus
description: You'll be able to chat with attractive girls, know their engaging storylines, receive spicy pictures, and solve Match-3 Puzzles to unlock new and cool pick-up lines for your waifu!

name: Race Boat Simulator
description: Get ready to experience the ultimate speed sensation!Feel the speed and conquer the waves!

name: Ladderway
description: Ladderway is a challenging 2D arcade game where you take the position of Jim, a man trying to climb up a building through several ladders while avoiding Mr. Mica's flowerpots as well as other obstacles.

name: New York Mysteries: Power of Art
description: Laura is on a new mission to discover the history of the mysterious fantasy-world paintings, unaware of the monstrous plan behind this evenings mystical events. She can't handle such a difficult mission alone!

name: Finish Report
description: Finish Report is a short science fiction horror game. All communications have been lost to a space station far in deep space. You as a one-man investigation unit has been sent to find out why did the station go silent.

name: Hotspace station
description: Hotspace Station is a fast-paced action arcade game where you use a grappling hook to navigate and defeat enemies. With unique mechanics, various weapons, and pixel graphics, it offers thrilling gameplay across multiple levels.

name: Astrality
description: After a training simulation gone wrong, a bounty hunter embarks on a journey to find treasures and adventure.

name: Vapor dash
description: Vapor Dash: Hardcore action platformer set in a vaporwave city. Stay in constant motion, make quick decisions, defeat enemies, and escape. Fast-paced, challenging gameplay.

name: Leafy Trails
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the mesmerizing world of Leafy Trail, where silence speaks volumes and nature tells its own story.

name: Sassy Cybergirl
description: Immerse yourself in a world filled with stunning cyber-girls, dazzling graphics and relaxing music.

name: Coloring Pixels: Transport Pack
description: This Transport-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Trains, Planes and Motor Vehicles! Put your seat belt on and color how we can traverse the world!

name: MamaShroom
description: MamaShroom is an exciting adventure-filled 2D platformer set across a variety of different lands, each rendered in beautiful pixel art. Embarking alongside Mama, you will help her reunite with her children across 40 levels in a game that will surely delight any cottagecore lover.

name: Sweet Feets
description: Sweet Feets is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Subway Simulator: Underground Train Ride
description: Subway Simulator is realistic simulation,provides an opportunity for train enthusiasts and gamers to experience the intricacies of operating a subway system.Players can delve into the world of underground trains and test their skills as responsible train operators.

name: Golf: Hole in One
description: Score in just one stroke in this singleplayer, minimalist golf puzzle game. You don't need friends or the internet, just play and relax with anytime with the game!

name: Platboarder
description: A combination of a board game and platformer. Roll the dice and play your cards to complete all the levels. Don't forget to pet the animals along the way!

name: Throwback
description: Throwback is set in a bright retro-futuristic world, you'll need to catch and thow newspapers to build up your highscore.

name: Bana Simulator
description:
A hilarious bullet hell adventure where a Bana (sentient banana) goes on a quest with his friends to defeat the tyrant Shadow Bana and save the world!
Travel the world to collect treasures, build new weapons, vanquish numerous bosses, and more!

name: Invector: Rhythm Galaxy
description: Navigate breathtaking, celestial worlds while mastering the beat of chart-topping hits from today’s most popular artists, including PinkPantheress, Charlie Puth, Duran Duran, and more. Discover fresh new music from tomorrow’s biggest stars on a cosmic trip where every note guides your way.

developers.name: Warner Music Group Video Game Licensing

name: Hentai: Mission Bombass
description: Sin descripción

name: Enchantment Secret Hideaway
description: Enchantment: Secret Hideaway is a magical hidden object game set in Thicket Wood, featuring various modes and puzzles to locate hidden fragments of magical objects and provide hours of fun and entertainment.

name: Goosey Guess
description: Goosey Guess is a guess simulator with a goosey theme! Dozens or even hundreds of items will spawn in a 3D environment and you have to guess how many are in the container. Batteries, dice, marbles, push pins, and many other items will be generated and fall into all types of different containers.

name: Try Again
description: You're Benny, a test character trapped in an unfinished game by a figure called The Designer. She's up against a deadline for her publisher which means it's your last day as a test character. Navigate the facility, dodge game-dev chaos and defy expectations to become the main character.

name: Jagged Alliance 3: Tactical Edition
description:
Introducing the Jagged Alliance 3 Tactical Edition!
This comprehensive kit is housed in a sturdy and waterproof case, ensuring your gear remains safe and dry. The Tactical Belt with a Belt Pouch provides quick and easy access to your essential items, while the A.I.M. pin showcases your allegiance to the cause.

Get to know the characters of Jagged Alliance with a set of 36 character cards, each showcasing their professions and personalities. As you strategize and plan your next move, immerse yourself in the game's atmosphere with the official soundtrack on CD. With the Jagged Alliance 3 Tactical Edition, you'll be fully prepared to take on whatever challenges come your way!

Here's the full overview:
- The Game on disc in a limited Media Book
- Outdoor case, 100% water- and dustproof & IP67 certified
-- Outer dimensions: 258 x 243 x 118 mm
-- Inner dimensions: 235 x 180 x 106 mm
- Heavy Duty Tactical Belt for your pants
- Tactical Belt Pouch for your gadgets
- A.I.M. Pin
- Set of 36 Character Cards
- Original Soundtrack on disc

This item is worldwide limited to 750 orders.

name: Abandoned Souls
description: Abandoned Souls is a horror game, shown through a GoPro lens. You play as a vlogger who specializes in urban exploration.

name: Swarm Survivor
description: A dark and moody top-down shooter. Unlock new weapons and upgrades by completing achievements, making each run different. Will you be able to escape the swarm?

name: Gimmick's Gadgets
description: Build and optimize your gadgets in this hex tile idle game! Generate Research and Focus, while using them to both advance the story and generate more Research and Focus, faster! Seek to ever optimize your gadgets as you unlock more ways to build!

name: Magnytour
description: Magnytour is for everybody who likes bicycle races. Take the role of a team manager and guide your team of 3 runners trough a series of grueling races that wind their way through mountains, plains and time trials. Play solo or multiplayer online.

name: Goobies
description: Battle thousands of blobs in this roguelike auto-shooter. Travel from island to island, defeat bosses, collect and upgrade items to become more powerful and discover lag-inducing combos in an endless blobbath.

name: Catch & Cook
description: Catch & Cook is a fishing adventure game in which you are not only a fisherman, but also a restaurant owner. Explore the ocean, catch fish and cook them in your own restaurant. A wide variety of fish, recipes and gameplay mechanics await you. So, what are you waiting for?

name: Kay's Destiny
description:
A retro style indie JRPG with pixel art graphics and a live piano soundtrack.
Created by youtuber "KayThePianist".

name: Cartoon Rage
description: Gather up to 8 friends in this friendship-strengthening game! Solve puzzles, think together, and beat all levels while having a lot of fun! Meet new obstacles and gameplay mechanics as you progress throughout the game until you reach the ultimate puzzles!

name: Tap Craft
description: Gather resources, craft new tools and build your idle empire on islands. This is an idle crafting game like you've never seen. Mine up rare metals, grow food to feed your thriving idle settlement, unlock new buildings, craft new items, and expand to new islands in Tap Craft.

name: Tales of: Sena
description: What does a lonely soul do, beyond the life that we know? Does it move on? Does it stay? Or does it enter the afterlife?

name: Rolling Realms
description: The official digital port of the Stonemaier Games roll-and-write

name: Conquer Humanity
description: Become the super villain in this brutal, isometric, fast paced bullet hell by a solo developer. Master your unlimited powers in combat, dismember civilians, cause mass destruction, defeat armed enemies and unique bosses. Be ready to Conquer Humanity!

name: Dragonspire
description: Embark on an epic journey into the anime world of Asteria. Bring your friends along and delve into endlessly different scenarios in this action-packed cooperative roguelike.

name: Bonnie's Bakery
description:
A game where you serve customers delicious food as Bonnie! Yes, that's all it is! A game where you serve customers delicious food...

Nothing else...

name: Dullpain
description: Dullpain is a side-scrolling, interaction, and storytelling game. Playing as Jingwen, a young boss of a long-established repair shop, you need to repair not only everyday items, also memories. You can enjoy dull-pain and breathtaking stories in different time and space and redefine the end of story.

name: Trouble Comes Twice
description: A bisexual romcom visual novel about first loves, sibling rivalry and college drama. Play as twins Hazel and Jace on their quest to becoming not-single before their twin can!

name: Call Hating
description: Master outdated technology and navigate the phone tree from hell to get your internet back on. At all costs.

name: Under Pressure
description: Flee or hunt? It's up to you! Time is running will you be fast enough to foil your opponent's strategy? Under Pressure is a bluff and deduction game.

name: The Warrior's Path
description: The Warrior’s Path is a singleplayer RPG, focused on your decisions in many different events. Those decisions can have longterm effects on other events. Prepare your character for hard fights with different crafting skills. How long can you walk on the warriors path? What's your story?

name: Exoprimal
description:
Exoprimal is a co-op action game with a competitive edge.
Two teams of five players in powered armor battle hordes of dinosaurs. Only one team will survive.

name: Blackberry the Witch: Journey
description: Embark on an adventure with the young witch Blackberry!

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Bear and the Jackal - Battlepack
description: Nine fierce firefights from the Soviet-Afghan War. Grab an RPG-7 and find a rocky place to hide behind: there’s a Soviet convoy coming down the road!

name: Rising Spire
description: Uncover the long forgotten secrets of the angels, challenge divinity and take back your own fate in this immersive, turn based RPG inspired by the golden age of classic JRPGs. Forge deep relationships, explore the land, and master the true powers of the Nephilim.

name: Jagged Alliance 3
description: The country of Grand Chien is thrown into chaos when the elected president goes missing and the paramilitary force known as "the Legion" seizes control. Hire mercenaries, meet interesting characters, and fight in tactically deep turn-based combat in this true successor to a beloved franchise.

name: Brick Rigs
description: Build your own vehicles or download one of more than 10,000 vehicles from the workshop and enjoy the dynamic driving and destruction physics of Brick Rigs!

name: Atelier Marie Plus: The Alchemist of Salburg
description:
A remastered version of the original Atelier Marie Plus, released with the Digital Deluxe Upgrade Pack with upgrade graphics and, for the first time, worldwide.
It is accessible from the Atelier Marie Remake main menu.

name: New Hope
description:
New Hope is an LGBTQI+ inclusive story starring Justin, an 18-year-old high school senior with two very big secrets. He's gay and trying to hold onto his secrets until finally finishing senior year and moving off to college. But when he loses his songbook, things take an unexpected turn as Justin begins to message a mystery guy who shares the same secret.

Being gay isn't the only thing Justin's trying to hide, however.

name: Motionrec
description: An action puzzle game with the concept of "recording and replaying movements."

name: Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon Chronicles
description:
Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon Chronicles is the ultimate bundle for fans of retro-style action games. This Japanese version of the game includes both Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon and its sequel, Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon 2, in one package. Experience classic side-scrolling gameplay with modern technology that harkens back to the days of 8-bit and 16-bit games.

With retro-style gameplay, stunning visuals, and intense action, Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon Chronicles is the ultimate gaming experience for fans of classic side-scrolling action games. Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the series, this game will provide hours of exciting and challenging gameplay.

name: Quake: Contract Revoked
description: Contract Revoked was a 2002 episode consisting of 4 levels and a start map, with knave textures, some modified models, and sounds. It was later made into an official free DLC for the 2021 remaster of Quake.

name: The Tape
description:
You have till 3am to escape the hotel or they they will come.

Watch tapes, progress and find a way out before it is to late...

Can you break the cycle?

name: NewCity
description: A Cyberpunk inspired city with a selection of unique buildings ready for exploration.

name: G-Mode Archives 48: Dragon x Dragon 2
description:
What is human charm? What is the truth contained in the holy flower pure bloom...

20 years after the story of DRAGON x DRAGON (Dragon x Dragon). "Seika Pure Brom" has been blooming all over the world since some time ago. The scent emitted from the petals heals people's troubles, seals the darkness that falls into the heart, and silence, innocence and "complete peace" come.

The Dark Dragon Genesis, which has reached its end, says, "In order to return to its original form, people must be released from Pure Brom someday."

The daughter of Willow, the main character of the previous work, "Adeku", embarks on a new adventure with the young dragon Lily.

Not only the characters from the previous work, but also the addition of new characters and enemy dragons has further increased the hit-in element.
Also, in this work, you can take over the level after returning from the dungeon, making it easier to play.

Adventure with the dragon and solve the mystery that sleeps in the ruins.

name: Paint Match
description:
Color blending puzzle game.
Match target colors by blending paint droplets and enhance your understanding of color theory along the way.
In each level, you are presented with a specific target color and a set of color droplets to mix. Your objective is to recreate the target color as precisely as possible using the provided droplets. Your goal is to replicate the target color as accurately as possible using the available droplets. As you advance, the difficulty escalates, progressively building your intuition and knowledge of color theory.

name: Rider Worlds
description:
Feast your eyes with brand new 3D graphics, and unleash your riding skills throughout the unique Worlds of Rider Worlds. Each of them provides a unique riding experience, and offers lots of content to unlock!
Grab one of the 18 unique vehicles and start flipping through 150 killer challenges!
Pimp your favorite bike with 144 custom looks and finishes to make it one of a kind!

name: Hollenburg 'Hell Castle'
description:
You are Father Karras and before you return home with your parishioners, you must travel to the Austrian border and put an end to all these evil experiments.
Explore the castle of hell and defeat the four satanic generals hiding in its dark walls.
Hollenburg is an arcade with video adventure elements; Explore the huge castle, collect items, collect experience points to level up and discover hidden secrets.

name: Warzone of Destiny 95
description: Destiny is decided… in the Warzone. In 1995.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Hitori
description:
A puzzle for connoisseurs.
Are you up for a challenge?

name: Beauty and The Beast: Interactive Book
description: Beauty and The Beast. Interactive classic stories for all ages.

name: Real Drift Multiplayer
description: Real Drift Multiplayer is a drifting game with realistic graphics and extensive customization options. Aim for the highest scores by competing with your opponents in single and online modes.

name: Police Car SUV Simulator
description: Police Car SUV Simulator is a police car simulation with realistic graphics. Catch criminals, take them to the police station, and customize your vehicle with the rewards you earn.

name: Garbage Truck Driving Simulator
description: Collect all the garbage in the city with the garbage truck and enjoy the car game.

name: Into the Flames: Retro Fire Gear 1
description:
Fight fires like it's 1980!
This pack grants you access to retro US firefighting gear.

name: Cute Capybaras
description: Spend your time with profit and pleasure! Play the puzzle game with the cutest and friendliest animal in the entire world! Find difference on pictures with capybaras!

name: Arcade Archives: Strato Fighter
description:
"STRATO FIGHTER" is a shooter released by TECMO in 1991.
In the year 2135 AD, the Earth Military mobilizes Codename "RAIGA" after an attack by an unknown enemy.
The future is in the hands of the two MB-OG fighters, and they depart for the enemy colony.
Use the turn button and a variety of weapons to take down enemies that come at you from all sides - vertically and horizontally.

name: Hypertension
description: Hypertension is the speedy challenging reflex game developed by Erik Games

name: Train Simulator Classic: Hope Valley Line - Manchester - Sheffield
description: Travel to the heart of the Peak District in Train Simulator Classic and explore the picturesque Hope Valley Line from Just Trains.

name: A Not Troll Game
description: A Not Troll Game, a pakour jump and run game where you are constantly being trolled. But, I warn you!

name: Watcher of Realms
description: Explore the mystical continent of Tya and immerse yourself in a magical world with 100+ unique heroes! Build your camp, collect and manage heroes of diverse factions and races, unlock powerful faction lords, and challenge the Ancient Gods.

name: VR Pterosaur Rock Climbing
description: This is a thrilling 3D virtual VR game, in which you can experience the intense and exciting rock climbing.

name: Crazy Sprint
description: "Crazy Sprint" is a fast-paced endless running game where players take on the role of a character who constantly runs. They control the left and right directions and perform jumping actions to avoid traps and continuously collect coins. Test your reflexes and skills, and aim for the highest score!

name: QUByte Classics: Risky Woods
description: Fortunately, you - the young warrior Rohan - have arrived to deliver justice to the evil hordes. With weapons in hand you must enter the risky woods and free the monks from their petrified captivity. Only when you've set the monks free and sent Draxos back to hell will wisdom be restored for good.

name: Needy Princess Nerd Club
description: Kaoruko joins the nerd club full of boys so that she can receive attention from them. An nerdy princess with a strong need for approval goes wild!

name: Elder Sister's Love Training
description:
A shy protagonist undergoes an intense training for his first kiss!!
Everything for the sake of the one he loves...

name: Robot vs.
description:
Dash, ascending, target switching, shooting, melee, avoiding, guard
Let's control a robot freely and defeat enemies

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Magic Stars - Collector's Edition
description: Uncle Randall of his investigative agency and the Guardian of Worlds appeal for your support in another plea for help - someone has once again encroached on the stars of magical worlds!

name: Summer Party Time
description: Get ready for the best summer ever! Party with your friends anytime, anywhere!

name: Football Cup 2023
description: Unleash your football skills like never before and show other countries who's the best team in the world! Lace up your boots and prepare for an unparalleled soccer experience!

name: Shattered Legacy
description: Start an exciting journey through a magical world, where the familiar idea of nudging blocks and solving puzzles combine to offer an amazing adventure puzzle game. Discover a magical world. Explore difficult puzzles and cryptic challenges in unique levels.

name: Neon Fantasy: Boys
description: Neon Fantasy: Boys is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Trolley
description: A multi-ending 2D action RPG set in an MMORPG world. A story of decisions made by a reclusive protagonist and the mysterious in-game NPC!

name: My Lovely Pets 2: Collector's Edition
description: "My lovely Pets 2" is an exciting game, which offers interesting ways to find funny and playful pets, as well as bright hidden objects, and a set of popular mini-games.
