Meet and make friends with these funny pets in beautiful game locations where they are always ready to hide and fool around.

name: AntarticaRoyale
description: This DLC adds the entire continent of Antarctica to the game along with new events, province types and more!

name: The Customer is Always Right!
description: Go on adventures as you take on a modern world in an old-school style puzzle RPG about being a cashier! ... Or so it would seem!

name: Summer Valley Hike
description: Embark on a soul-soothing journey through the captivating Summer Valley. Leave your worries behind and let the beauty of this peaceful world envelop you. Summer Valley Hike is your ticket to a serene escape from the chaos of everyday life.

name: Sonic Prime Dash
description: Zip through 3D race courses, jump over obstacles and battle iconic villains in this high-octane running game featuring the world's fastest blue hedgehog.

name: Manic Mechanics
description:
It’s time to dust off your overalls and hitch on your toolbelt in Manic Mechanics - a chaotic couch co-op game where you and up to three fellow grease monkeys serve the car-obsessed residents of Octane Isle.

Your mission? Work your way through Octane Isle's five neighborhoods, challenging the Master Mechanics that rule each part of town. Repair as many cars, trucks, choppers, tractors, mini-subs (and even UFOs) as possible to prove your worth in this hectic race against the clock.

name: Revenge of Noxi
description: Play as the ultimate ninja badass Noxi using magic, sword and shurikens to fight off an army of monsters and save your loved one. Bring Noxi to the top floor of her ruined home over dangerous terrain with athletic jumps, flips, sprints and slides

name: The Isolated Town
description: Shoot down enemies and avoid danger in an attempt to save your new friends on a grand adventure!

name: Battle Bows
description: Grab your bow and rain magical arrows down from your castle tower. Defend the castle heart against increasingly challenging waves of evil balloons and defeat difficult giant bosses in this epic VR tower defense game. Play online co-op mode or solo and climb to the top of the seasonal leaderboards!

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Episode III: End of Hallucinations
description: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Episode III: End of Hallucinations is a VR crime Investigation game.

name: Train Valley 2: The Pandeia Project
description: Brought to you by our community member and a renowned level designer Dracken - in cooperation with Flazm Interactive!

name: Sapiens Craft
description: Begin as a small stone age tribe. End as a global super power in a future age. Craft and research your way through history!

name: X-Force Under Attack
description: X-Force Under Attack brings back all the charm of shmup games from the 80's/90's. It's a frenetic and chaotic space shooter created from amazing graphics with insane battles against extremely difficult bosses.

name: Testament: The Order of High-Human
description: Testament is a first-person single-player action-adventure game with bits of RPG and metroidvania elements set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy world. It offers a mixed combat with different possibilities and combination by sword, spells and bow while it is rich with platforming and puzzles.

name: The Moonflower
description: The Moonflower is a cooperative horror-survival video game the game is set in an abandoned forest island, where there is the known demon "Moonflower" and the players will have to block it as much as possible / hunt it via an underground laboratory.

name: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
It’s not about saving the world. In this "leisure adventure RPG," failing student Marie pursues alchemy, adventures, and quests while aiming to graduate in five years. "Atelier Marie," the origin of the Atelier series, has been remade with new elements!

Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

Full original game “Atelier Marie Plus: The Alchemist of Salburg”
Gust Extra BGM Pack
"Another Look" Costume Set（Set of 33)

name: Mini Golf Aeons
description: Experience the ultimate mini golf adventure! Navigate through desert, encounter prehistoric creatures, and brave the frozen icebergs of Antarctica, all with stunning courses based on real-life greens and precise physics. Enjoy solo or multiplayer modes with friends for a fun-filled VR experience.

name: Hell Denizen
description: Fast paced action first person shooter. Earth has been invaded by demons. The demon rulers have evil laws. They found out you're transgender and are now hunting you. Slaughter large masses of transphobic demons, zombies and other monsters in colorful environments. The game runs on FTEQW engine.

name: Chrono Rift
description: Join the Breach Hunter Guild in Chrono Rift, a multiplayer online coop game of fantasy, action and roguelike elements. Defend the world from monster invasions caused by mysterious breaches and uncover the truth behind the phenomenon. Play now!

name: The King's Campaign
description: The King's Campaign is a hybrid of Grand Strategy and Real-Time Strategy gameplay set in Medieval Europe and North Africa, where you manage your cities, engage in diplomacy and direct your armies on the world map before plunging into battle and commanding your troops directly on the battlefield

name: Life of Slime
description: Life of Slime is a cute story game in which you have to play as a slime named Slami.

name: Touhou: New World
description: Delve back into the world of Touhou in this bullet hell action-RPG adventure! The boundary between Gensokyo and the outside world has been breached, and it falls to Reimu Hakurei and Marisa Kirisame to discover why. Level up skills, forge new equipment, and explore Gensokyo to uncover the truth!

name: Sliding Swords
description: A roguelite, dungeon crawler, where you move all objects at the same time, and the same types that touch - merge into one! Defeat enemies, level up, solve quests, unlock new things, upgrade your character, and cast powerful spells! This game is a part of the TAnima Universe.

name: Ragmonton
description: Ragmonton is a Physics-Based Ragdoll Roguelike > Fight enemies by collecting and combining your body parts for special powers, discover transformations, acquire unique relics and modify your power in a way that every run is unique.

name: Sacred Zodongga Defense
description: Defend the sacred island of Zodongga against waves of invaders looking to subjugate and colonize them and "liberate" their exotic fruit resources. What's not to love about this challenge?

name: Yet Another Zombie Survivors
description: The Horde is coming, but you're ready to fight it! Arm your team to your liking and discover which synergies work best against thousands of the undead. Survive, evolve, and break the limits in this casual yet heart-pumping rogue-lite reverse bullet hell.

name: Aeons Past
description: Aeons Past is a 3D Turn-Based RPG with heavy emphasis on rewarding exploration, getting immersed in a story-rich narrative, and deep characterization.

name: Operation Wolf Returns: First Mission
description: Operation Wolf Returns: First Mission is the remake of the first Rail Shooter that shaped the genre. It sticks to the DNA of the original game – a breathtaking action atmosphere inherited from 80’s action movies – while offering a brand-new design and a leaderboard.

name: Yupitergrad 2: The Lost Station
description: Immerse yourself in the updated version of Yupitergrad 2: The Lost Station - experience hours of space adventure in VR, offering a huge base to explore, crazy robots to shoot, and a solid portion of humor, puzzles, and obstacles to overcome!

name: Ed-0: Zombie Uprising
description:
Ed-0: Zombie Uprising takes place in Edo era Japan—but millions of zombies have raided the isolated country! Enter this world as a Samurai, Sumo Wrestler, or Ninja to slaughter the massive horde of undead. Strengthen your character by gathering items and skills in unique dungeons. Everything is randomly generated each time you play! No run is the same. Dungeons won't be easy, so expect tension with every run—fight to the brink of death and make harsh decisions to survive.

Encounter countless surprises and unpredictable adversaries as you expand your power and achieve greatness. Every run is unique. Player judgment will be essential, having to face “once-in-a-lifetime” challenges amid a hoard of zombies.

name: The Bingo Room
description: The Bingo Room is a stream interactive game designed for hosts to play with their audience. This game is part of the On Stream brand by Pixel by Pixel Studios.

name: Gravity Circuit
description: Gravity Circuit is a flashy action packed 2D platformer in the spirit of console classics. Follow Kai, a lone operative war hero who harnesses the mysterious powers of the Gravity Circuit, on an adventure in a futuristic world inhabited by sentient robots.

name: Hunting Sniper
description: Embark on a thrilling journey into the wild with Hunting Sniper, the premier free hunting game. Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action of stalking and capturing wild animals in their natural habitats.

name: B99 Overclocked
description: Sin descripción

name: Hide and Seek: Toilet Monster
description: Hurry up! The Skibidi Toilet Monster is attacking the Cameraman!

name: Orbit Salvager
description:
Part of the DOS Games June 2023 Jam.

Play as long as you can and try to beat your own score.

Collect clothes dryers (to prevent them from eventually falling on cities below) without missing any, and don't crash into the cities yourself!

The ship has very little fuel on-board, and every action (thrust, shots) use some fuel. Make more fuel by shooting asteroids, with your asteroid-to-fuel converter beam.

name: The Space Brigade: Space Raiders - Refueled
description:
Classic-Arcade Styled Space Shooter, Fast Paced, Simple Gameplay.

The game is intended for short sessions, as it's more of an infinite shooter rather than a complex experience.

The game is available for Microsoft Windows and Android in it's complete state with updates from time to time.

name: Team Fortress 2: Summer 2023 Update
description: The Summer 2023 Update, also labelled as simply Summer, was a major update for Team Fortress 2 that was released on July 12th, 2023. It introduced 14 new maps, 25 new cosmetic items, 10 new War Paints, 6 new taunts, and 20 new Unusual effects in total (12 for cosmetics and 8 for taunts), as well as a new community-created game mode: Versus Saxton Hale.

name: Too Hot to Handle 2 Netflix
description: More choices, bigger drama. Get ready to get hotter in the new season of Netflix's spicy interactive story game based on the hit reality series. Go for love or risk it all by breaking Lana's infamous rules of romance. Change up your look and mingle with a new batch of sizzling singles on a paradise island in this interactive story game. Can you feel the love — and heat — in the air?

name: Lumen Rider
description:
Prepare for the ultimate adrenaline-fueled battles like never before!
Engage in exhilarating combat, soaring through the air on your bike!
Equip yourself with powerful weapons and embrace the rush.
Hold your breath, take aim, and unleash your skills when foes emerge.
From explosive bombs to lethal discs and blazing fire, a wide array of weapons awaits your command.
Conquer cities, deserts, ruins, and futuristic metropolises, and claim victory as your own.

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character - All Guys Pack
description:
Additional Character for "Goonya Monster".

- Tsukasa Tenkai/All Guys (Buster)
- Gatchman V/All Guys (Buster)
- Mari Tomari/All Guys (Buster)
- Meika Utai/All Guys (Buster)

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Extended Edition
description: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.

name: Hit the Color
description: Hit the right color to progress to the next point and earn more score.

name: The Riftbreaker: Gold Edition
description: The Riftbreaker Gold Edition contains the core game and all available addons.

name: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg Digital Deluxe Upgrade Pack
description: An upgrade set featuring the original game "Atelier Marie Plus," extra costumes, and BGM.

name: Party Party Time: Character Skin Pack 2
description: Customize your character! Change up your look with over 20 different skins! Be it a ninja, clown, or astronaut, dress up in style and get ready to party!

name: NYX x Barbie: The Movie
description: NYX x Barbie: The Movie is a promotional arcade game based on the 2023 Barbie movie.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Hitori
description: "Hitori" is a puzzle in which you fill in any unnecessary numbers, making sure that the same number doesn't appear twice in the same line. Once you get the hang of it, you can feel the joy of figuring out the many various gimmicks thought up by the creator. This is a puzzle for real connoisseurs.

name: Mordhau: Gold Edition
description: Mordhau is a multiplayer medieval slasher. Create your mercenary and fight in brutal battles where you will experience fast paced combat, castle sieges, cavalry charges, and more.

name: Cards We're Dealt: Prologue
description: Wander haunted halls as an office temp and collect magical cards with supernatural abilities to fight demons and save the office from being dragged to hell in this upcoming horror, deckbuilding, roguelike game.

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Mari Tomari/All Guys
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Mari Tomari/All Guys (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Gatchman V/All Guys
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Gatchman V/All Guys (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Meika Utai/All Guys
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Meika Utai/All Guys (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Tsukasa Tenkai/All Guys
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Tsukasa Tenkai/All Guys (Buster)

name: Tides of Dominion
description: Embark on a maritime adventure in Tides of Dominion, set amidst the rollicking waves of uncharted seas. Conquer islands, gather precious loot to upgrade your ship, and remember - in this game of nautical domination, it's either sink or swim!

name: Bugsnax
description:
Bugsnax is a humorous action adventure game in which we explore an island full of creatures that are hybrids of worms and food. The game was developed and released by independent Young Horses studio.

The iOS release includes the content from the previously released update “The Isle of BIGsnax,” as well as an entirely new control scheme via touch screens, while also supporting a wide array of third-party controllers.

name: Trainz Plus: NR Class Locomotive - National Rail Mega Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, numbering 120 units. These locomotive are seen on freight trains all over Australia, as well as the famed Indian Pacific, Ghan, and Overland passenger trains.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NR Class Locomotive - National Rail Mega Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, numbering 120 units. These locomotive are seen on freight trains all over Australia, as well as the famed Indian Pacific, Ghan, and Overland passenger trains.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: NR Class Locomotive - National Rail Mega Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, numbering 120 units. These locomotive are seen on freight trains all over Australia, as well as the famed Indian Pacific, Ghan, and Overland passenger trains.

name: Celebrating Pani Puri
description: July 12th 2023’s interactive game Doodle celebrates pani puri — a popular South Asian street food made of a crispy shell stuffed with potatoes, chickpeas, spices, or chilis and flavoured waters. And there’s a variety of pani puri for everyone’s taste buds! On this day in 2015, in Indore, Madhya Pradesh, a restaurant called Indori Zayka and Dainik Bhaskar achieved the World Record for serving the most flavors of pani puri by offering 51 options, under the guidance of Masterchef Neha Shah.

name: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour Thailand
description: An unforgettable journey to the land of bright colors, smiles and fabulous beaches. Collect puzzles and enjoy the atmosphere of mysterious Thailand.

name: Falling Down
description: The main character must find all six pieces to repair the spaceship in order to continue the journey. Obtaining the six pieces requires navigating through challenging stories and making difficult decisions involving the people on this planet.

name: I Love Finding Cats & Pups
description: Have a pawsome adventure finding cats and pups!

name: Continent of the Ninth Golden
description: Continent of the Ninth Golden is an action MMORPG. Players take part in the game as heroes of Blenheim to stand against Nefer, an evil villain trying to open a gate to the Netherworld and swarm the land with his infernal legion.

name: Wyrmicide: Tombstone Die
description: Unlock the Tombstone die to let loose the living dead! This DLC allows you to bring the Tombstone die into any battle. It offers new pieces and buffs, and its offerings may be purchased by either player in a match.

name: DNF Duel: Season Pass
description:
The Season Pass for DNF Duel is set to have 5 characters released by the end of 2024, each character will also be available separately.

The characters included are Spectre, Brawler, Battle Mage, Monk and a 5th to be revealed later.

name: DNF Duel: DLC 1 - Spectre
description:
'Spectre' can be used in DNF Duel.

Spectre is the first character in the DNF Duel: Season Pass and was released alongside a major balance patch and gameplay update that added new systems to the game.

name: Block Gun
description: Block Gun is a fast paced 3D Platformer speedrun oriented in which you have to infiltrate a computer system. But don't worry you have a block gun ! Use blocks to create platform to make a path to the end of each level and finish each level as quick as possible !

name: Manabaz
description: Minimalist Arena Brawler - play against neural network controlled bots

name: Soulsland 3: Spider Invasion
description: After old enemies defeated, new enemy raised, Evil Giant Spider and his army has captured souls to bottle. World needs again Lord Barbarus and his skills

name: Wyrmicide
description: There may only be one true Wyrm King and you're tasked in ensuring his succession! Engage in an exciting blend of turn-based tactics and real time 1v1 duels as you Stab, Shoot, Magic and Fireball your way to Victory!

name: Alien Cube
description: Alien Cube is a futuristic puzzle adventure game full of traps! Help Logan find his way out of the HYPERCUBE!

name: Impeached 2
description: Anyone can be President, so why not you? Become President of the United States in this text-based political satire strategy game, then push your morals and values upon hundreds of millions of people. Will you be a benevolent leader or a ruthless dictator?

name: Castaway Station
description: An anomaly has destroyed your cruiser, stranding you alone on a hostile planet. Castaway Station is a roguelike deck-builder game with limited-use cards and permanent death. Complete dangerous missions to locate other survivors and gather the resources you need to live another day.

name: Highrise Guardian
description: Boots on the ground while firing above the cloud! Highrise Guardian is an Arena FPS. Gear up with weapons of your choice, Form the fighting flow with a selection of abilities and perks, dominate your enemies with map control, and make an art-like battle style to become the Anime gunslinger.

name: Monster Museum
description: Have you ever dreamed of having your own museum where you can collect monsters? Dream no further, because now you can do it in Monster Museum!

name: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg
description:
It’s not about saving the world. In this "leisure adventure RPG," failing student Marie pursues alchemy, adventures, and quests while aiming to graduate in five years. "Atelier Marie," the origin of the Atelier series, has been remade with new elements!

The remake changes include:
Character designs and event illustrations have been revamped, 2D animations have added and there are now 3D models of characters and stages.

The tutorial and navigation of the game’s features have been expanded and improved. The methods of moving around the city and collecting items in the field has been modified to meet modern-day demands, making it more comfortable and easier to play.

The new Unlimited Mode, which allows you to play at a more relaxed pace by removing the five year deadline, and the addition of new events that enable interactions with new characters.

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Booster Course Pass - Wave 5
description: Eight more courses, including the all-new Squeaky Clean Sprint, plus three new characters: Petey Piranha, Wiggler & Kamek.

name: Madtale
description: Madtale is a time-saving and strategic idle RPG with a dark fairytale theme. Embark on the enchanted adventure with Little Red Riding Hood.

name: Oxenfree II: Lost Signals
description: Five years after the events of Oxenfree, Riley returns to her hometown of Camena to investigate mysterious radio signals. What she finds is more than she bargained for.

name: EarthX
description: Have you always dreamt of becoming CEO of the largest rocket company in the world? It just came true. Start with practically nothing and end up with a rocket empire. In EarthX you can develop rocket technologies, but also your company and planet Earth!

name: Guitar Hero II: Deluxe - Brand New Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Goddess of Fate IV: Lilith
description: Lilith, who is the Dark Goddess of Fate, has come to the planet at the Doomsday! Build your army of beauties to protect your homeland!

name: Effortworld
description: A very difficult hack for SMW with 57 exits

name: SeasonPark
description: In this Game you follow the story of a man that is searching his wife and his kids. They all disappeared in an abondend indoor playground. This indoor playground is themed after the four seasons with its mascots named Sally Spring, Siggi Summer, Frederick Fall and Willy Winter. You need to break in this playground and explore it to find your children and wife ( with no keycards!!!). You get the help from your friendly winter stick. With that stick, you can create ice blocks on which you can jump on.

name: Fun Chess: Ultimate Edition
description:
Pick your favorite

Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

Hone your skills

name: Impulse
description: A game of carball.

name: Tay Son Dynasty
description: This is a multiplayer action combat game set in the period of Tay Son dynasty which had many victories highlighted the intelligence, bravery and patriotism of the Vietnamese people.

name: Just Find It 2
description: Find more differences and play an assortment of fun new games in Just Find It 2!

name: Shadow of the Night: Monsters
description: Shadow of the Night : Monster is a battle against monsters on a deserted island and a struggle for survival.

name: City Car Parking Simulator
description: Enjoy city driving in the City Car Parking Simulator, full of realistic driving experiences and challenging parking missions. Customize your vehicle and test your skills in this simulation game that offers a unique atmosphere with its graphics.

name: Born to Rise
description: To complete Yridis' mission, you'll have to make your way through the bowels of a vast underground dungeon filled with unique environments, deadly dangers and mysterious beings. Jump, dash and give the enemies you encounter their due thanks to powerful weapons.

name: Touhou Fantasy Destination
description: What kind of game is this? This is a second fan game of Oriental project. This work contains different settings from the original, so please pay attention to the players who feel uncomfortable about it

name: Train Sim World 3: Southeastern Super Starter Pack
description: Discover the ultimate UK route experience in Train Sim World 3 with the Southeastern Super Starter Pack! Featuring the extended 89-mile Southeastern Highspeed route, the leaf-blasting Rail Head Treatment Train, unit-dragging Rail Operations Group Class 37, and the brand-new Thameslink Class 700/0!

name: Unsolved Case: The Scarlet Hyacinth - DLC
description: It's time to make your choice! A whole series of crimes happens right in front of your eyes: a murder in an alley, the murder of your boss, a kidnapping in broad daylight, and so on... Can you handle it all?

name: Unsolved Case: The Scarlet Hyacinth - Collector's Edition
description: It's time to make your choice! A whole series of crimes happens right before your eyes: a murder in an alley, your boss getting shot, abductions in broad daylight, and so on… Can you deal with it all?

name: Sky Is Arrows: Celestial Bow Item Chest
description: This DLC introduces 20 captivating new items that will revolutionize your gameplay experience. With each item carefully designed to enhance your hero's abilities, you can forge your own path, adapt your playstyle, and unleash devastating strategies upon your enemies.

name: Quantum Rail
description: Quantum Rail is a thrilling, fast-paced first-person shooter that takes you on an exciting adventure through a sci-fi-themed wild west world.

name: Multiplayer Mercs
description: Multiplayer Mercs - Bad Dudes are attacking the Refinery, it is up to You and Your Elite Force Team to Stop Them !

name: Gangster Coin Pusher
description: A gangster-themed spoof coin pushing game Unique strategy to push coins, control coin drops, activate your jackpot! Run a community and upgrade your weapons. Defeat bosses to win rewards

name: Soulchemist Renafine
description: In the game, players will follow the journey of ‘Soulchemist’ Renafine, who has to strengthen the soul of the monsters in order to defeat the army of the Great Demon King.

name: Backrooms: Realm of Shadows
description:
Backrooms: Realm of Shadows is a horror game that takes place in a seemingly endless maze of interconnected rooms and hallways, known as the Backrooms. The game is based on the popular internet creepypasta about a mysterious place that exists between the walls and floors of buildings, a place where people can become trapped and lost for days, weeks, or even years.

In the game, you play as a person who has become trapped in the Backrooms, and your goal is to find a way out before the endless maze drives you insane. The Backrooms are a surreal and unsettling place, filled with strange noises, flickering lights, and mysterious creatures that seem to be watching you from the shadows.

As you explore the Backrooms, you'll need to find keys, solve puzzles, and avoid dangerous traps and obstacles. You'll also encounter other lost souls who are trying to escape, but not all of them can be trusted. The deeper you go, the more unsettling the Backrooms become, and the harder it is to tell what's real and what's just a figment of your imagination.

Backrooms: Realm of Shadows is designed to be a tense and atmospheric horror experience, with a focus on exploration, puzzle-solving, and survival. It's a game that will keep you on edge from start to finish, as you try to find your way out of this terrifying and otherworldly place.

name: Starshifter
description: Starshifter is a game about shapeshifting, desert animals, and finding your place.

name: Toilet Head: Grand Thief City
description: Bring peace to the city by fighting against the Skibidi Toilet gangsters.

name: Fawning Over a Corpse
description: "Nothing is wrong with my deerly beloved; she's just hungry."

name: Descriptionary
description:
Descriptionary is like a classic drawing board game, but the roles are reversed; instead of drawing something based on a prompt while others guess what you’re drawing, you’re given a vague description of something and then you have to guess what you were supposed to be drawing!

Join our bunny-themed cast featuring a wide variety of characters who all need your help! Try to navigate their individual mannerisms in order to depict what they’re trying to describe, all under a time limit.

name: Girlfriends: Rich vs Rebel
description: Experience the life of an average high school student, driven by a rebellious spirit that sets you apart. Uncover deep feelings concealed beneath the composed facade of your childhood friend and class president, Saki Urakaze. Yet, your attention is irresistibly drawn to Emi Otoishi, the enigmatic "bad girl" who unexpectedly becomes your roommate. As you navigate lighthearted moments and intense emotional trials, shape your relationships with Saki and Emi, discovering the essence of love, forgiveness, and personal growth. Who will win your heart in this epic high school love saga: Emi or Saki? The choice is yours!

name: Plumley's Trot
description: Plumley's Trot is a retro-style platformer about collecting cartons of plum juice. Its first iteration was made in 10 days for Retrograde Jam 4, intending to evoke the "GBC port of a MegaDrive game."

name: Ace Fishing: Crew
description:
Enjoy fishing and the underwater scenery with your Crew! Ace Fishing: Crew!
Alone or together, it's enjoyable!

From the thrilling feeling of fishing while observing the movements of fish underwater, to the fun of cooking and selling the fish you catch!
Experience the life of an angler in Ace Fishing: Crew.

name: Five Nights At Bidens
description: You are the new security guard at the white house. It is your job to make sure nobody gets in or out of the building. I do have to warn you: the presidents do tend to get a bit 'quirky' at night..

name: Jailbreak: The Ultimate Escape
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating journey through the world of incarceration in "Jailbreak: The Ultimate Escape," an exciting and intriguing visual novel game.

name: Yappie! Knockout
description: You can play with up to 24 players simultaneously across 13 levels. It's time to call your friends and use your running, jumping, and other skills to win in Yappie!

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Hakon Bundle
description: Become the fierce nightrunner hellbent on survival with the new Hakon Bundle. Arm yourself with charm, wit, and the tools necessary to navigate through the treacherous nights of The City.

name: Colormitation
description:
Fun and addictive puzzle game! Mix and Match Colors! Infinite Gameplay!

Arcade Mode:
Race against the time to match your canvas with an automatically generated one. Complete the canvas as fast as you can to earn more points!

Practice Mode:
Play casually and take all the time you need when mixing and matching your colors on your canvas.

name: Gnomes Garden: Lifeseeds - Collector's Edition
description: The subjects came to the Gnomes Queen with alarming news. All gardens, forests and meadows began to fade. And so throughout the gnomes land!

name: Nature Mahjong
description: Mahjong against the backdrop of mesmerizing nature! Radiating freshness, soothing music and relaxing levels await in this game!

name: Absorber
description: Absorber: An addictive idle RPG adventure in which you absorb the strength and abilities of defeated enemies. Explore a fantasy world, defeat challenging enemies. Immerse yourself in the unique gameplay. Will you rise to become the ultimate absorber?

name: Fantastic Dream
description: I dreamed of a girl. From then on, I saw her every day in my dreams. I don't know why it happened. I can only keep telling myself that it is all false, all illusion. But on the other hand, I fell in love with it.

name: Soul Detective
description: Worthy Souls are being held back from moving on the land of the dead, the Soul Detective Agency is on the case! Our Detective and his trusty partner Magnus, enraptured in the magnifying glass creating a ghoulish weapon of destruction, are here to defeat the demons who are causing this catastrophe.

name: Doomies
description: An ultra-violent platformer arcade shooter, featuring tons of guns, metal music, super satisfying gameplay, funny one-liners, dark humor, and a freak-ton of spicy ketchup!

name: Greed of Man
description: Greed of Man is an open world multiplayer game where you live in a town built and ran by real players. Players can buy and own their own Houses that they can decorate as they wish. There is an in game economy also influenced by players. Players can choose to start their own jobs and run their own legal businesses like shops and factories, but they can also get a little more spicy with their money by constructing underground black market business like drug and weapons cratering. And not only can players purchase properties but they can also build one, or hire a construction company to build one. You can also rob other peoples business, but be aware of players playing as cops as they can always stop you in your conquest of crime.

name: Delivery Kore
description: It is an open world adventure game that tells the story of Kore, a girl who lives in Eleusis, a forest in Middle-earth where spirits gather, and Poring, who was born from a Spirit Flower. Become Kore, a forest girl, explore the forest of Eleusis with Poring, and deliver Poring to a new world.

name: Paddle Flap
description: Ready, set, FLAP! Flex your paddle flapping skills in this casual but engaging arcade game. Imagine pinball, but remove all distractions and just focus on the ball action. Use the paddle to strike the falling balls and make them hit the right targets to earn points, power-ups and achievements!

name: Self Layout Shooter
description: Self Layout Shooter plays like your average Shoot'em Up...but there's a catch: Each round you have to place your own enemies.

name: DodecaDragons
description: DodecaDragons is an incremental game created by Demonin. DodecaDragons utilizes stacking layers of prestige systems to use player's resources, and keep them relevant through the entire game.

name: NPC Adventure
description: Play as Greg, a lowly shopkeeper, on a RPG adventure to do the knight’s job and defeat the evil King in this game made for the Game maker’s Toolkit Jam 2023.

name: Better Cluck Next Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Picture Builder
description:
Picture Builder is a delight for enthusiasts of pixel art, color by number, puzzles, object finding, hidden objects, and other logical games and brain teasers. Within Picture Builder, you'll discover various cityscapes initially devoid of life. It's up to you to assemble all the elements of the picture, with each object or character representing a distinct puzzle piece. Since all puzzles are entirely unique, playing Picture Builder is always a joyful and intriguing game experience.

Each location unfolds before you in parts, requiring you to collect all objects to fill the city with interesting situations and characters. Your task is to find the correct fragments for each picture, enlarge objects, and utilize hints. In Picture Builder, you independently craft the city and its inhabitants, piece by piece. Puzzle-solving has never been this enjoyable. Install the puzzle game now and receive countless urban locations with an endless array of pixel puzzles.

name: Poki
description: Pick up blocks and guide poki through 10 wacky puzzles!

name: Monster Bargain
description: Created for the GMTK 2023 Game Jam, "Roles Reversed". Assume the role of a monster in a JRPG and use the battle menu to swindle the hero for everything they've got!

name: Enough Sheep
description:
The wolves are following the innocent sheep! Your job is to push them inside the circles to make them disappear.

This game was developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roles Reversed"

name: Ned Flanders Kills the Simpsons!
description: Must...Kill...Best...Friend! It was bound to happen. Somewhere deep inside everyone's favorite neighbor-ino, a darkness has bubbled to the surface, and now Ned Flanders is on a killing spree! Hey, they warned me that Satan would be seductive!

name: Miss Paint: Part 1
description:
To start us off, a bit of Athenian trivia. "Peristeri" is a real area of Athens, and the Greek word for "pigeon".

You will find pigeons in this fictional version of Peristeri - or, rather, they will find you - but were we to name this godforsaken place after the creature that populates it most densely, we really should call it "Cops".

Cops are a part of this story. Homeless men are a part of this story. Young artists who suffer menial part-time jobs to fund their creative pursuits are a part of this story. The protagonist of this story, however, is a middle-aged woman named Iris.

You would call Iris a protagonist, but you would never call her a hero, especially not to her face. If you called Iris a hero, she might actually die. Why? Because, God, she's no hero, am I? I mean, is she? Let me answer that: she's not. In fact, she's nobody, really. A totally unexceptional, deeply conservative, borderline detached shadow of a person who'd just like some paint. Pai--? Sorry, I meant paint. No. Not paint. I was gonna say she just wants some--

P a i n t.

name: Reach Charon
description:
Your ship has made an emergency landing at the Charon base, and you have fainted from the crash. When you wake up, your pilot is dead, and no one is answering the radio. Luckily, you've brought your trusty shotgun with you on the ship.
Reach Charon is an MBF21 map that will test your nerves. An adventure in a forgotten and abandoned base in the most remote area of the solar system, where no one can help you.

name: Chambered Fate
description:
Chambered Fate is a role reversal of the shooter genre. Instead of shooting enemies, you take control of the bullet fired from the gun and steer its trajectory into your enemies. Use your environment to your advantage and try to eliminate all enemies with as few bullets as possible. Your fate has been chambered, prepare to be fired.
Submission in the GMTK Game Jam 2023

name: Archaeology
description: Small strategy game created for GMTK GameJam 2023 in 48 hours. Take a role of an archeologist, but instead of digging treasures you put them back into the ground for others to find.

name: Inside Job
description: A reverse tower defense

name: Princess Paladin
description: A dungeon crawler where you are the minion!

name: Throw Me To My Planet
description: A lost square trying to find his planet in a huge space. It's all about a square who wants to go to a planet and face consequences.

name: Magnetism Rally
description:
Rei's going on a date. In your experience, this tends to be pretty disastrous, so you need to do your best job as her dog to prevent her from screwing up too badly.

Made by Sev and Kiki for the GMTK 2023 Game Jam, 'Roles Reversed'.

name: Five Nights at Starry
description: Can you survive all five terrifying nights at STARRY? Five Nights at Starry is a horror fan game based on Five Nights at Freddy's and Bocchi the Rock!

name: Dinovaporate
description: Delay the impending doom of the dinosaurs! Destroy groups of blocks by clicking. When falling magma blocks reach bottom you lose health and a vertical row. Upgrade your block level to convert falling magma blocks to normal blocks.

name: Iceberg Command
description: This game recreates the eternal strugle between ships and icebergs. But you are the icebergs.

name: Red Terror
description: A first person shooter for the play date

name: Underlevel
description: Underlevel is a game where you play as a horde of skeletons while a player is raiding the dungeon, trying to get as much XP as they can so they level up and potentially kill the boss at the end - it's your job to stop that from happening. Try your best to rescue all the skeletons, destroy all the loot and keep the player from levelling up before they make it to the final floor.

name: Making the Game
description: become the developer. create your masterpiece. sell a quadrillion copies.

name: Video Editor's Toolkit
description: Take on the role of Mark Brown and edit the GMTK video of the best games of this year's jam! Watch out though, because the video editing software is misbehaving a bit today... it may get a bit puzzly!

name: Infiltrating a Cult: Additional All-Ages Story & Graphics DLC
description: "Additional All-Ages Story & Graphics DLC" is you can play the game that graphics and story without adult contents for all-ages.

name: An Eye for Optical Theory 1666
description: An Eye for Optical Theroy 1666 is a short point & click horror adventure game with a focus on atmosphere and narrative. It is the plague year of 1666 and Isaac Newton, in lockdown at his home, has been thinking on the topic of Optics, and planning a series of experiments. Will you help him?

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the Base Game, Premium Cosmetic Set and Starter Set DLCs.

name: Turkey Man
description: Your A Turkey From Space Trying To Stop A Company That's Trying To Kill You

name: Alice Not More
description:
Alice Not More is a visual novel with a thriller theme, in which you take the role of a police psychologist who has to investigate a serial murder case. To do this we must enter into the mind of Alice, the suspect of the case.

She stays in the Chester psychiatric hospital. Our job is to determine what happened, unraveling the mysteries of Alice's past.

Is she the culprit or just another victim?

name: Spyro 3.5: Return to the Forgotten Realms
description: Sin descripción

name: Reunion
description: It's been 3 years since the loss of your Parents. Now you've got out of the Orphanage and you want to find your missing Brother, which might still be alive somewhere.

name: Backbone's Rampage
description:
You play as the treacherous Backbone in his quest to spread villainy across a city full of super heroes, with splendid surprises awaiting you!
Made for the GMTK game jam 2023 in under 48 hours.

name: Pilgrim's Peril
description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler for the Game Boy Color. Roll dice to move across randomised sets of regions, employing whatever random selection of treasures, abilities and paths you come across to strategically push through to respite. Learn tactics, earn trophies, and push to improve your high score as you uncover what little information you can about the curse that looms over the land.

name: Tainted
description:
In your tainted land, an unfathomable cosmic horror takes root. Monstrous abominations sow chaos and despair, while the Rune of Power, pulsating with forbidden energies, is stolen. To restore harmony and repel doom, you must drive back the eldritch creatures and reclaim the Rune of Power...
8 Singleplayer maps made for Copper

name: Mario's Red Curtain
description: Sin descripción

name: Beehive Bedlam
description: An initially unreleased and incomplete remake of Beehive Bedlam from 2004 by Denki, that reached internal beta testing. In 2023 the game was finished and made available to play on Denki's website.

name: One Night as Freddy
description:
One Night as Freddy intends to give a faithful and fun twist on the Five Nights type of gameplay by instead giving you control of an Animatronics from the original game instead of the usual POV of a Nightguard.

The game lets you see through the eyes of popular animatronic Freddy Fazbear as he roams the games pizzeria attempting to enter a nightguards office.

name: Pause To Play
description: A puzzle game where the role of the pause menu is reversed!

name: Amaze! Relax Edition
description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

name: Mystical Mixing: Complete Edition
description:
Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

name: Waspkeeper
description: Waspkeeper is an action roguelite game where your main goal is to survive as long as possible in a field full of venomous wasps with one out of four playable characters.

name: Invicta: The Next Queen
description: Invicta: The Next Queen is a TopDown Soulslike game where a legendary warrior must fight her way through hell and claim her soul once more. Take the role of Moma as you explore the labyrinthian dungeons that make up the Circle of Greed and defeat King Midas in single combat.

name: Approaching Cao Army
description: This is a positional combat game that combines elements of Snake, Grid Avoidance, and Vampire-style combat. Players control the entire team of heroes by controlling the leader. The cute art style, beautiful music, and smooth rhythm combine to offer a pleasant experience.

name: Honey Are You There?
description: Matthew Nate, a middle-aged man plagued with mental health problems whose home has become a site of unexplainable paranormal activity and a malevolent female entity is pursuing him to his death.

name: Five Nights At Smog's Poutinerie
description: You are taking the guard night shift in a poutinerie located in The York. There is a unknown monster in the restaurant trying to get you.

name: The Duchess Affair
description: The Duchess Affair is the first and only book of the The Duchess Affair series.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Limited Edition
description: The Limited Edition includes The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Deluxe Edition, "Legends of Zemuria" Hardcover Art Book, "Songs of Reverie" Official Soundtrack, "Three & Nine: A Trails Tale" Softcover Novel, Steelbook, "The End and the Beginning" Acrylic Print and Collector's Box.

name: Crimson Tides of Tethyr: Enhanced Edition
description: A remaster of the classic Hall of Fame module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. A 20-hour adventure with a colorful cast of characters, epic war storyline, and tactically challenging encounters inspired by Baldur's Gate, this enhanced edition features rewritten dialogue, visual improvements, bug fixes, new systems and quality-of-life improvements, a new hour of gameplay content, and 100 new lines of voiced dialogue.

name: Adventure of Roger
description: Sin descripción

name: The Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Night at Banban's II
description: BanBan's Kindergarten follows you back to your home in the countryside. What will you do? The official sequel night's at BanBan'a Kindergarten!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Idol
description: Friday Night Funkin': Idol is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the anime Oshi no Ko. The mod features various songs from the anime, including Idol.

name: Bluey: Let's Play!
description: Explore, imagine, create & play in Bluey's house. There's so much to do! Wackadoo! Come join Bluey, her friends & family!

name: Aria
description: Based on the album by CMD094, Aria is an interactive homage to the themes of the original album and classic RPG games from which it took its inspiration. Aria aims to replicate the experience of the classic 2D top-down RPG from the age of floppy discs and humming CRT monitors. Explore the world of Aria from peaceful plains and magical temples to mysterious forests, talk to its residents, defeat enemies, discover its secrets... and most importantly save Aria!

name: Fashion Friends: Special Edition
description:
Fashion is better together with your friends!

Become a stylist to the models, actresses and fashion girls! Play a mix of classic arcade games where you have to cut the picture in a new game aimed for children and adults alike.

name: Twinkle Star Knights
description: Twinkle Star Knights is Bishoujo RPG based on the Japanese visual novel Twinkle Crusaders developed by Lillian and released in September 2008. The project is supervised and planned by game artist Rei Kannagi from Creative Team Kuma-san.

name: 100 Doors Escape: Let me In!
description: 100 doors game challenges and brain teasers are quite fun, but we invite you to try your luck in 100 Doors Escape: Let me In! Join our guy in this toilet rush game and help him overcome numerous obstacles by playing hidden object mini games and solving escape puzzles. 100 Doors Escape: Let me In! game is a fun find the key to open the doors experience. Unlock the door to enter the room in this quite amusing get in the toilet game.

name: Real Truck Driver Simulator USA
description: Drive a real truck in Real Truck Driver Simulator USA! Become an American truck driver, and show your driving skills. Choose cargo and drive it to transport it to city warehouses. Upgrade your truck for better driving and to earn more money. Fix and refuel an American truck at service stations and fuel stations. Avoid driving cargo above the speed limit, and follow driving rules for the transport. Spend money wisely and enjoy the day and night driving experience.

name: Gondola's Adventure: Single Player & Local Multiplayer
description: Lead Gondola on an adventure, climbing between the depths of the earth to the skies. Just remember to watch your step along the way.

name: Paint Bowl
description: Fast Downhill Bowling!

name: Urban Flow: Summer Edition
description: Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

name: Urban Flow: Ultimate DLC Pack
description:
Content included in collection:

- Expansion Pack
- Winter Expansion Pack
- London Rules
- Streets Supplement

name: TheFighters: NewBlood
description:
Improvements in the game graphics which make the game more playable than before,
most things changed in-game
- adding a Cut Scene
- HDR + 4k
- Player movements
with my previous game the player was just jumping with one animation, Now all movement animations added
- AI bot more intelligent than before
- Camera position
- Sounds effects

name: EZ2on Reboot: R - Fortress Collaboration DLC
description: FORTRESS Collaboration is the DLC for EZ2ON REBOOT : R.

name: Prop Game
description: Play as a chair, a wizard's hat, a magnet and much more! You can then challenge your friends to solo or team mini-games.

name: Sunny Village
description: This is a strategy game that simulates the construction of villages in the 70s, in which you are a prestigious village leader who leads the people to create a prosperous and happy village from a wasteland.

name: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire - Vol. 3
description: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire is an Adventure game.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Furries
description: Poly Jigsaw: Furries is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute furry.

name: Secret Pie: Hidden Room
description: Secret Pie DLC Hidden Room~!

name: Forest of Lesbians
description: A fantasy comedy hybrid visual novel. Simple fast paced action/puzzle gameplay between story elements. Anime/pixelart/jrpg style.

name: Cabin of Souls
description: Cabin of Souls is a mix between a horde-based rogue-lite and a tower defense game, where the player is one of the towers. The player has the choice of either upgrading their defenses, or upgrading their weapons, leading to very different gameplay depending on the player's upgrading strategy.

name: Feeble Light
description: Blast off as a little star trying to rid the cosmos of angry celestial beings in Feeble Light, a 3-tone pixel art shoot’em up where minimalistic presentation makes way for precision controls and fluid animation!

name: Pine Creek: The Book of Judith
description: A cozy-thriller adventure game focused on exploration, story, and following clues. Have friends, think about life, think about death, eat tasty food, and play games in the arcade!

name: Super Box Delivery: Beyond the Horizon
description: You'll be transported to a vibrant cartoon world full of whimsical cars and charming customizations. With fun controls and an ever-changing landscape, this game will keep you entertained for hours on end.

name: Cyber Ninja that Climbs the City
description: You, the Ninja, have to climb up the skyscrapers of Cyber Tokyo using your grapple, while destroying the Tokyo cops with your Katana and Beam Gun! Play simple run of three stages aiming for the top of the Cyber Tower of Tokyo!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Premium Cosmetic Set
description: A bundle of cosmetic items that includes 18 sets of accessories along with a swimsuit for Swin, Nadia, C and Lapis.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Standard Cosmetic Set
description:
A set of 15 cosmetic items that includes the following DLC:
- Crow's Branch Campus Uniform
- Easternwear outfits for Elie, Alisa, Tio, Altina, Lapis, Nadia and Noel
- Eastern Commander Set (Commander Rean, Commander Lloyd, Commander C)
- Commander C Sans Mask
- Eastern Warrior Set (Warrior Crow, Warrior Randy, Warrior Swin)

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - SSS Summer Splash Set
description: A DLC bundle that includes Daydream 'SSS Summer Splash' and swimsuits for Elie, Tio, Rixia, Noel, KeA, Lloyd, Randy and Wazy.

name: Cavera: The Island of Apes
description: Cavera - Island of Apes: top vacation spot for Apes and degens. Socialize, dance with up to 99 others. Explore, swim, chill on this multiplayer game.

name: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Emerald Tablet: Craziest and Madness Edition
description: Embark with Tad and his friends on a new journey through different cities where you will encounter challenging puzzles in your quest to get the emerald tablet.

name: The Picture of Cafe au Lait
description: The picture of café au lait is a visual novel game that makes the players feel immersed in story and character. They will experience the story in the game through the first-person perspective of the main character in the story named "Takagi".

name: Devil's Dive
description: Devil's Dive is an action platformer rogue-lite. Dive deeper and deeper into the depths to regain your title as Lord of the Underworld... if you can defeat the usurpers! Death will see you spat out, returned to the surface. But you may Dive again, stronger!

name: New Heights
description: New Heights is a physics-based climbing and bouldering game.
